info-job__text: 統一超商技術經理(客戶資料平台CDP)
info-company__text: 統一超商股份有限公司
info-description:
職位介紹：作為資料科學經理，您將帶領一支包含資料科學家與資料工程師的團隊，負責建置並維運大規模資料處理流程，並運用機器學習與人工智慧技術產出洞察，支援公司決策與產品優化。此職位需要針對龐大且多元的資料進行整合與分析，確保系統具備高可用性與擴充彈性，並與其他團隊（如工程、行銷、產品）密切合作，制定資料驅動的策略與專案。
職責：
● 訂定團隊目標與期望，培養以成長為導向的團隊文化，並適時提供回饋與指導。
● 策畫並推動資料科學技術與工具的路線圖，導入適當的機器學習平台與基礎建設。
● 監督並指導資料科學家與資料工程師的工作流程，確保在資料蒐集、處理、建模和部署各環節都符合最佳實務。
● 與各部門合作，理解業務需求並定義專案範疇，確保資料分析結果能夠真實落地並帶來效益。
● 建立並維護資料安全與合規機制，確保組織在使用資料時符合隱私與合規要求。

info-description:

5. 其他主管交辦事項。

運用累績20年的美妝產業豐富資料庫，透過洞察不同消費者化妝品之關注趨勢及行為模式分析， 進行產業商業資料分析、並找出可能趨勢變化及提出洞見與行銷決策建議。

info-company__text: 新加坡商譽佳有限公司台灣分公司
info-description:
Senior Data Analyst for E-Commerce & Retail Analytics
Location: Taizhong preferred, Taipei acceptable
Starting Date: Asap


Job Overview

We are seeking an experienced Senior Data Analyst to join our team and work in an international environment. This role will focus on analyzing and visualizing data across E-commerce, Supply Chain, Marketing, HR, and Warehouse operations. The ideal candidate will have strong expertise in Tableau, SQL, and Python, as well as experience working in a retail or e-commerce environment. This is an exciting opportunity to help integrate local data systems with global platforms, optimize reporting, and generate valuable insights for the business.



Key Responsibilities:

Data Analysis & Visualization
- Develop dashboards and reports using Tableau & Looker Studio.
- Ensure effective data usage across teams (E-commerce, Supply Chain, Marketing, HR, Warehouse).
- Proactive Insights & Business Impact

Identify key trends and KPIs to optimize business performance.
- Proactively lead discussions on what insights bring the most value to Taiwan.
- Align local analysis with global resources while ensuring relevance for Taiwan.

Collaboration & Technical Support
- Work closely with the data engineer and regional teams (Vietnam) to ensure seamless data integration.
- Support the CRM & Marketing teams in understanding customer loyalty, churn rates, and engagement trends.
- Collaborate with the E-commerce team to define the best ways to leverage data insights.

Technical Data Processing & Optimization
- Extract, clean, and optimize data using SQL & Python.
- Optimize SQL scripts by avoiding multiple joins, using temporary tables/views.
- Improve data modeling and production pipeline (Data Lake, BigQuery, AWS/GCP, Databricks, framework BBT).

Statistical Analysis
- Perform correlation analysis, detect sampling biases, and optimize database performance.

Communication & Reporting
- Present insights to stakeholders and support decision-making with data-driven recommendations.


Requirements
- 8+ years of experience in Data Analytics, preferably in retail or e-commerce.
- Expertise in Tableau, SQL, and Python for data analysis and visualization.
- Experience with cloud platforms (GCP, AWS, BigQuery, Databricks, Data Lake).
- Strong problem-solving skills and ability to drive data-driven decision-making.
- Experience in data modeling and production pipelines.
- Ability to collaborate with both technical and business teams.
- Languages: English (required), Mandarin (required).


This role is critical in shaping local data strategy and ensuring the seamless integration of local and global systems. If you are a data-driven professional passionate about delivering impactful insights, we encourage you to apply!

info-company__text: 英屬開曼群島商萬里雲互聯股份有限公司台灣分公司
info-description:
【Job Summary】

We are seeking a motivated and detail-oriented Junior Data Analyst to join our growing Data Governance team. This entry-level role will support the implementation and enforcement of data governance policies, standards, and procedures across the organization. 


【Responsibilities】

● Data Quality Monitoring and Support: 
    ○ Assist in the monitoring of data quality metrics and identify potential data  quality issues. 
    ○ Support data cleansing and remediation efforts under the guidance of senior team members. 
    ○ Contribute to the development and maintenance of data quality rules and standards. 

● Data Documentation and Metadata Management: 
    ○ Assist in the creation and maintenance of data dictionaries, data lineage documentation, and other metadata artifacts. 
    ○ Support the cataloging and organization of data assets within designated data governance tools. 
    ○ Ensure data documentation is accurate, up-to-date, and easily accessible. 

● Policy and Procedure Support: 
    ○ Assist in the implementation and communication of data governance policies, standards, and procedures. 
    ○ Support the training and onboarding of employees on data governance guidelines. 
    ○ Contribute to the review and updates of data governance documentation. 

● Data Access and Security Support: 
    ○ Assist in the management of data access requests and ensure adherence to security policies. 
    ○ Support the monitoring of data access and usage to identify potential risks. 

● Collaboration and Communication: 
    ○ Collaborate with data owners, data custodians, and other stakeholders to understand data requirements and address data-related issues. 
    ○ Participate in data governance meetings and provide updates on assigned tasks. 
    ○ Escalate complex data issues to senior team members for resolution. 

● Continuous Improvement: 
    ○ Identify opportunities for process improvement within the data governance framework. 
    ○ Stay informed about industry best practices and emerging trends in data governance. 
    ○ Contribute to the development and implementation of new data governance initiatives. 


【Qualifications & Skills 】

● 1–3 years of experience in data engineering with a focus on cloud-based data platforms. 
● Hands-on experience with AWS data services (Glue, Lambda, Step Functions, S3, Athena, Redshift). 
● Strong programming and scripting experience in Python and SQL. 
● Experience working with dbt for transformation logic (preferred). 
● Experience with Data Warehouse platforms (e.g., Snowflake, Databricks, Redshift). ● Familiarity with CloudFormation, Terraform, or other IaC tools (a bonus). 
● Strong communication skills and the ability to collaborate with cross-functional teams. 
● Strong problem-solving and debugging skills. 


【備註】
此職務須駐點至客戶端，位於台北市南港區。

We exist to wow our customers. We know we’re doing the right thing when we hear our customers say, “How did I ever live without Coupang?” Born out of an obsession to make shopping, eating, and living easier than ever, we’re collectively disrupting the multi-billion-dollar commerce industry. We are one of the fastest-growing retail companies that established an unparalleled reputation for being a leading and reliable force in the commerce industry.

We are proud to have the best of both worlds — a startup culture with the resources of a large global public company. This fuels us to continue our growth and launch new services at the speed we have been since our inception. At Coupang, every day is filled with the excitement of building, you will see yourself, your colleagues, your team, and the company grow every day.

Our mission to build the future of commerce is real. We push the boundaries of what’s possible to solve problems and challenge traditional tradeoffs. Join Coupang now to create an epic impact in this always-on, high-tech, and hyper-connected world.

What will you do?

we warmly welcome recent graduates to apply for this position

info-job__text: 產品研發工程師/SaaS系統模組設計師
info-company__text: 鼎盛佳科技股份有限公司
info-description:
公司產品描述
Goojob 是一套專為企業設計的低代碼 SaaS 解決方案，協助組織以最少資源快速搭建數位流程與表單系統。我們的產品核心包括「數位化流程」、「智能表單」、「自動化節點」與「資料整合視覺化」，能廣泛應用於人資管理、營運流程、專案追蹤、績效回饋等多種企業場景。我們相信，簡單好用的工具，是推動企業數位轉型的第一步。

目前已被超過百家企業使用，包含傳統製造、科技新創、顧問公司、非營利組織等。我們正在尋找對產品充滿熱情的夥伴，一同打造更聰明的工作世界！

【你的日常任務會像這樣】
- 開發並維護低代碼系統核心模組（如表單、節點、自動化流程）。
- 協作釐清業務情境，將需求轉化為邏輯化設計與功能實作。
- 撰寫技術文件與流程規格，維持架構一致與可維護性。
- 進行表單設計、後台設定與系統測試。

【我們希望你是這樣的人】
- 熟悉 JavaScript、流程設計或資料庫操作經驗佳。
- 有 Excel 函數、邏輯判斷與報表製作能力。
- 若有低代碼或表單平台開發經驗為大加分。
 - 具備多條件邏輯判斷與流程節點設計能力，能開發具高度擴展性的表單系統模組

【制度福利】
・勞健保、勞退提撥一樣都不少
・三節獎金、年終獎金誠意滿滿
・彈性上下班時間，通勤不必人擠人
・生日禮金讓你當天主角光環加身
・定期/不定期聚餐與小活動，工作之餘也能放鬆一下
・辦公室零食隨你拿，嘴饞時刻不怕餓
・熱鬧尾牙活動，抽獎不手軟

【辦公環境】
我們剛搬進全新辦公室，寬敞明亮、氣氛輕鬆
你可以自由選擇座位，今天想坐哪、屁股說了算！

info-company__text: 美國融文國際營銷有限公司
info-description:
CreatorDB is a dynamic startup specializing in influencer marketing SaaS solutions. Our platform is designed to empower brands and agencies to discover and collaborate with influencers seamlessly. As a rapidly growing company, we are looking for a talented Data Analyst to join our marketing team and contribute to our mission of revolutionizing the influencer marketing landscape.

Position Summary:
As a Data Analyst (Marketing) at CreatorDB, you will be responsible for analyzing and interpreting user and market data to gather insights, inform marketing strategies, and establish thought leadership. You will play a pivotal role in shaping our strategy and ensuring our marketing efforts align with our business objectives.

Key Responsibilities:

- Process, analyze, and interpret wealth of data into clear and actionable insights for marketing optimizations. 
- Visualize data in compelling formats to communicate to stakeholders and establish thought leadership.
- Lead data-driven initiatives that inform content ideation, audience growth and strategic improvements..
- Collaborate with various marketing stakeholders to determine meaningful insights that drive content strategies and campaigns.
- Stay informed about the latest trends, tools, and technologies in influencer marketing and data analysis to enhance CreatorDB’s marketing efforts.

Qualifications and Experience:


Requirements:
- Fluency in spoken and written English with strong communication skills
- Familiarity with influencer marketing, SaaS platforms, or B2B marketing strategies.
- 3+ years of experience in data analysis to generate meaningful insights.
- Ability to comprehend and integrate information effectively with keen attention to detail.
- Exceptional storyteller, skilled in crafting compelling narratives from data insights.
- Highly autonomous, responsible, and accountable, with a strong desire to learn, grow, and adapt.

You are a naturally curious individual who enjoys questioning and challenging the status quo.

Technical Skills:
- Proficiency in Python and key data science libraries (e.g., pandas, NumPy, SciPy).
- Proficiency in SQL databases (e.g. BigQuery).
- Proficiency in data visualization & business intelligence tools, such as Mixpanel, Excel, Looker Studio, Tableau or Power BI

What We Offer:
- Low Hierarchy: We believe in collaboration and direct communication. Reporting lines are short, and we want you to be a partner rather than following a top-down approach.
- Growth & Learning: We embrace experimentation—fail, learn, and try again until you succeed. We encourage innovation and continuous professional development.
- International Team: Work alongside talented professionals from diverse backgrounds, bringing unique perspectives and insights to our global mission.
- Open Communication: Transparency is key. We foster an environment where everyone’s voice is heard, and ideas are valued.
- Impactful Work: Your insights will directly influence marketing strategies and business decisions, shaping the future of influencer marketing.


Additional Information: We welcome foreign talent, but an ARC is required to apply.
Join us at CreatorDB to kickstart your career in data analysis (marketing) while working with a dynamic and innovative team! Apply today to be part of our journey to revolutionize influencer marketing.

info-company__text: 雷亞遊戲股份有限公司
info-description:
Data analysis is the key to developing successful games and products. Rayark is looking for a savvy Data Analyst to join our data analysis team. You will use your solid data analysis skills to provide insights and feedback to game producers, designers and operations executives to help them make good decisions. The ideal applicant will have a passion for understanding business problems and goals. The applicant will also utilize data analysis technologies to improve game design and business development.

### RESPONSIBILITY
- Analyze and extract key insights and patterns from gameplay and behavior data of our players.
- Provides recommendations to game designers and producers according to the facts found from the data.
- Work closely with cross-functional teams to understand their data needs and translate business requirements into effective data analyses and actionable insights
- Research the latest data analysis techniques and trends and apply them to the company's business
- Perform data quality checks to ensure data accuracy and completeness
- Enhancing data collection procedures to include information that is relevant for analyzing data and building business metrics.
- Work with data engineers to build effective ETL pipelines
- Design dashboards and visualize data

### REQUIREMENTS
- Master's Degree with a specialization in Statistics, Applied Math, Computer Science, Economics or in a related quantitative field or equivalent work experience.
- Experienced with statistical analysis approaches such as clustering, regression, and statistical inference.
- Familiar with SQL
- Experience with data visualization tools like Tableau, Power BI, Looker Studio
- Strong data processing, analysis, and interpretation skills
- Strong problem-solving skills
- Interested in studying user behavior and business problems
- Passion for games
- Familiar with A/B testing
- Excellent communication skills and a team player

### PLUSES
- Familiar with BigQuery or MongoDB
- Experienced with Python, CoLab, R, or other data discovering and visualization tools
- Data-driven decision making
- Relevant industry experience

### APPLICATION REQUIREMENTS
- Cover letter
- Resume
- Transcript (Applicants who recently graduated, just discharged from the army or have less than 1 years of work experience)

info-job__text: Senior Fraud Analyst (台中以外可遠端)
info-company__text: 勁游有限公司
info-description:
What We Need:

We are seeking an experienced and strategic-minded Senior Fraud Analyst to join our team. The ideal candidate will lead efforts to proactively detect, prevent, and mitigate fraud risks by developing analytical initiatives, leveraging data-driven insights, and implementing innovative fraud prevention strategies. This role will collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to safeguard the organization and its stakeholders.

Key Responsibilities:
● Fraud Prevention and Detection: Develop, implement and monitor proactive fraud detection and prevention strategies and risk-scoring systems. This includes building fraud rules or heuristics and designing tactical or mitigation across our platforms and games.
● Data analysis and insights: Analyze complex datasets to identify fraud patterns, trends, anomalies or vulnerabilities. Generate actionable insights to mitigate risks, including identifying data opportunities or gaps.
● Process Enhancement: Evaluate and enhance existing fraud detection and prevention processes and tooling to improve effectiveness of identifying various fraud. Build a fraud risk management framework and participate in risk assessments for pre or post-game launches.
● Collaboration: Work closely with internal teams, including backend technology, game designers, data analysts, and operations team to align fraud strategies. Validate concepts with attack simulations or scenarios.
● Reporting: Prepare detailed reports and dashboards to communicate findings, trends, and recommendations to management and key stakeholders. Monitor KPIs related to fraud detection, prevention or fraud risk management as a whole.


Who We Think Will Be A Great Fit:
● A Bachelor's or Master's degree in Data Science, Statistics, Finance, Computer Science, Engineering, or a related discipline.
● Minimum 3-4 years of experience in fraud analytics, risk management, or a related field, with an overall 5+ years of work experience. Experience is igaming industry is strongly preferred.
● Proven experience in developing and deploying fraud detection and prevention tools.
● Proficiency in SQL, Python, or other data analytics languages and tools. Familiarity with machine learning systems is a plus.
● Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
● Excellent communication, problem-solving, and presentation abilities.
● A passion for gaming and eagerness to learn about the industry. Stay up to date with emerging fraud schemes, technologies, and adapt strategies accordingly.

About Us:
We are a global leader in innovation and technology, dedicated to solving the world’s greatest challenges through sustainable solutions. By leveraging advanced science and engineering, we deliver products and services that meet our customers' evolving needs.

Job Overview:
We are seeking a talented Data Scientist Contractor specializing in computer vision to join our team. This role will focus on developing and implementing advanced computer vision algorithms and models to enhance product development and operational efficiencies within our R&D department.

Key Responsibilities:
• Design, develop, and deploy robust computer vision algorithms and models to analyze and interpret visual data.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand project requirements and translate them into technical specifications.
• Conduct experiments to evaluate and optimize model performance, including accuracy, efficiency, and scalability.
• Analyze large datasets to extract actionable insights and support decision-making processes.
• Stay current with the latest research and advancements in computer vision and machine learning.
• Document and communicate findings, methodologies, and project updates to stakeholders.

info-job__text: 資深資料工程師 / Senior Database Administrator
info-company__text: 奕界科技有限公司
info-description:
We are a dynamic game development company dedicated to creating engaging and innovative gaming experiences through our proprietary brands. Our primary focus is on integrating our services with third-party operators and platforms, allowing players worldwide to enjoy our games. We are currently expanding our data management capabilities to support our back-office reporting and business analytics.

# Responsibilities
1. Design and implement database architecture utilizing PostgreSQL for transactional data and MongoDB/DynamoDB for session and game round data.
2. Develop and maintain strategies for data lifecycle management, including procedures for migrating data from hot to cold storage.
3. Set up and optimize data warehousing solutions using technologies such as AWS Redshift.
4. Prepare and maintain data structures to support BI initiatives with tools like Tableau.
5. Monitor database performance, troubleshoot issues, and implement optimization strategies to ensure efficiency.
6. Identify and resolve database deadlocks and other performance bottlenecks.
7. Implement high-availability solutions for business-critical databases.
8. Design and maintain robust backup and recovery procedures.
9. Work closely with development teams to optimize database queries and schema designs.
10. Document database architecture, procedures, and best practices for future reference and compliance.

# Qualifications
1. Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
2. 5+ years of experience as a Database Administrator.
3. Strong expertise in PostgreSQL administration, optimization, and SQL query optimization.
4. Experience with NoSQL databases, specifically MongoDB and/or DynamoDB.
5. Proven experience with AWS cloud services, particularly RDS and Redshift.
6. Knowledge of data warehousing concepts, their implementation, and experience with BI tools like Tableau or similar platforms.
7. Strong understanding of database security best practices and experience with database monitoring and alerting tools.
8. Familiarity with Apache Iceberg or other data lake solutions.
9. Understanding of data protection and privacy regulations.
10. Proficiency with automation and scripting for database management tasks.
11. Certification in relevant database technologies.
12. Excellent English communication skills, both written and verbal.
13. Experience in the gaming or iGaming industry is a plus.

info-job__text: Senior Android Developer（台中 / 台北）
info-company__text: 時刻科技股份有限公司
info-description:
在 Seekrtech，我們專注於透過科技、設計和行為科學的融合，打造有趣又有效的數位服務，幫助人們在生活和工作中做出改變與行動。我們引以為傲的產品「Forest 專注森林」，已經在全球擁有超過四千萬用戶，最高在 165 個國家獲得效率類付費榜榜首，也榮獲 Google Play 與 App Store 多個獎項肯定！

我們希望尋找一位具有創新思維與技術熱情的 Android Developer，你將扮演關鍵角色，主導並參與新產品的開發工作，從技術的角度支持產品升級、優化。你也需要對自己的技術決策負責，確保程式碼品質和技術解決方案的合理性和可行性，同時積極學習和應用新技術，保持團隊的技術領先性。

加入我們，在開放、創新與支持性高的工作環境中，我們一起幫助用戶在繁忙的生活中找到變好的魔法，打造世界級的產品吧。

【工作內容】
- 主導產品開發和維護工作，提出可行的技術方案，符合市場需求與用戶期望
- 與產品團隊合作，深入了解用戶的產品使用習慣及需求，持續優化產品性能及用戶體驗
- 與工程團隊合作，開發並實施新功能、團隊 code review，並及時修復用戶反應的使用問題
- 構建可複用的模組化工具套件，提供公司各產品使用，進一步作為 open-source 專案帶動行業發展
- 持續關注最新技術動態和市場趨勢，積極學習和應用新技術，保持技術領先性

【專業職能】
- 至少三年以上 Android App 開發相關經驗
- 熟悉 Android 平台的開發生態
- 熟悉開發語言：Kotlin、Java；主流開發架構：MVVM 等
- 熟悉的函式庫：Jetpack Compose、Coroutines、Flow
- 熟悉資料結構、演算法與物件導向概念
- 熟悉前後端運作原理、RESTful API 串接
- 熟悉版本控管的概念與 Git 的操作流程
- 具有產品思維，能了解用戶需求以及產品功能背後的意義

info-company__text: 立特有限公司
info-description:
----工作內容----
1. 後端系統開發與維護
    *使用 Golang 實作並維護企業後端服務與 API。
    *依照需求設計並優化系統架構與資料庫結構。
2. 資料庫操作與優化
    *使用 PostgreSQL 進行資料庫設計、調校 (tuning) 與維運。
    *使用 Redis 進行快取、Session 管理、即時資料處理。
    *針對時間序列資料，使用 InfluxDB 建立並維護資料存取流程。
3. API 設計與串接
    *設計並開發高效、穩定的 RESTful API 或 GraphQL API。
    *與內部或第三方系統串接，確保資料交換與安全控管。
4. 系統監控與維運
    *建置並維護系統監控、日誌 (logging) 機制。
    *配合 DevOps 流程進行自動化部署與持續整合 (CI/CD)。
5. 與前端或其他團隊協作
    *若為全端工程師，需同時負責前端開發 (以現有框架為主，如 React、Vue 等)。
    *與 PM、設計師或其他工程團隊密切合作，確保專案順利進行。

----職務需求----
1. 必要條件：
    *熟悉 Golang 或者 C++ / C / JAVA 任一種或多種
    *具備使用 PostgreSQL、Redis、InfluxDB 的實務經驗

    *具備前端開發經驗 (React 等框架)
    *對微服務架構 (Microservices)、Message Queue (Kafka、RabbitMQ) 有經驗
    *熟悉 Linux 系統操作與 Shell scripting
3. 軟性條件：
    *具有良好溝通能力與團隊合作精神
    *自主學習、能持續追蹤並學習新技術
    *樂於分享與協作

•	舉辦內部培訓，介紹鑑別式AI與生成式AI的特性、應用場景及影響
•	針對不同部門需求，提供客製化的 AI 工具應用講座
•	建立 AI 知識庫與 FAQ，讓員工能快速查詢AI相關資訊
2. No Code / Low Code 工具導入與應用
•	評估適合企業內部的 No Code / Low Code AI開發工具
•	教導員工使用這些工具來設計和測試簡單的 AI 解決方案
•	針對企業內部案例，建置 AI 解決方案原型，並讓相關單位試用

二、AI應用開發與導入規劃
3. AI 解決方案開發與測試
•	依據企業需求，規劃 AI 應用（如 RPA+AI、自動化報表、客服 Chatbot 等）
•	使用生成式AI來自動化資訊整理與決策輔助
•	測試 AI 工具的可行性，並收集使用回饋
4. AI導入流程與專案管理
•	建立 AI 導入標準流程，包括需求確認、資源分配、試用與驗證等
•	與 IT、AI應用團隊合作，確保 AI 系統與現有架構相容
•	規劃試點專案，選擇適合導入 AI 的業務流程並進行小規模驗證

info-company__text: 英屬開曼群島商萬里雲互聯股份有限公司台灣分公司
info-description:
【Job Summary】

We are seeking a highly motivated and detail-oriented Junior Business Analyst to join our dynamic team. This entry-level role offers an exciting opportunity to contribute to key business initiatives by analyzing requirements, documenting processes, and supporting the delivery of impactful solutions. The Junior Business Analyst will work closely with stakeholders across different departments and collaborate with technical teams to ensure projects align with business objectives..


【Responsibilities】

●Requirements Elicitation and Analysis: 
    ○ Assist in gathering business requirements through various techniques such as interviews, workshops, and surveys. 
    ○ Document and analyze business needs, functional and non-functional requirements clearly and concisely. 
    ○ Support the creation of user stories, use cases, and process flows. 
    ○ Assist in prioritizing requirements based on business value and feasibility. 

● Documentation and Communication: 
    ○ Create and maintain project documentation, including requirements specifications, process maps, and meeting minutes. 
    ○ Communicate effectively with stakeholders at all levels to clarify requirements and provide updates. 
    ○ Support the development of presentations and reports to communicate findings and recommendations. 

● Process Improvement: 
    ○ Assist in analyzing existing business processes to identify areas for improvement and optimization. 
    ○ Contribute to the development of proposed solutions and process changes. 
    ○ Support the implementation and monitoring of process improvements. 

● Collaboration and Support: 
    ○ Work closely with cross-functional teams, including developers, testers, and project managers, to ensure alignment and successful project delivery. 
    ○ Provide support during testing phases by clarifying requirements and assisting with issue resolution. 
    ○ Participate in project meetings and contribute to discussions. 

● Data Analysis and Reporting: 
    ○ Assist in collecting and analyzing data to support business decisions. 
    ○ Contribute to the creation of basic reports and dashboards. 
    ○ Support the identification of data trends and insights. 

● Learning and Development: 
    ○ Actively seek opportunities to learn and develop business analysis skills and methodologies. 
    ○ Stay updated on industry best practices and emerging trends. 
    ○ Participate in training and development programs as required. 


【Qualifications & Skills 】

● Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Information Technology, Economics, or a related field. 
● Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. 
● Excellent written and verbal communication skills. 
● Ability to effectively communicate technical concepts to non-technical audiences. ● Strong attention to detail and organizational skills. 
● Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Visio or similar process mapping tools). 
● Ability to work independently and as part of a team. 
● A proactive and results-oriented approach. 
● A strong desire to learn and contribute to the success of the organization. 


【Preferred Qualifications (Not Mandatory)】

● Familiarity with Agile or Waterfall methodologies. 
● Basic understanding of database concepts and SQL. 
● Experience with requirements management tools (e.g., Jira, Confluence, Azure DevOps). 
● Previous internship or project experience in a business analysis or related role. 


【What We Offer 】

● Opportunity to work on enterprise-grade AWS projects with a forward-thinking data team. 
● Exposure to modern data architecture and AI/ML-enabling pipelines. 
● A dynamic, growth-focused environment with opportunities to learn new tools and methodologies. 
● Hybrid work flexibility (where applicable). 


【備註】

此職缺為約聘駐點職務，工作地點位於台北市。合約期間為一年，並視工作表現與專案需求可續約。職務相關細節將於面談時進一步說明。

info-description:
【職位說明】
我們正在建立一個全新的資料科學小組，從真實的水務資料出發，探索資料背後的潛力，並將其轉化為能創造價值的產品與營運洞見。這不只是分析資料，更是一段打造資料產品的旅程。
你將成為這段旅程的起點之一，參與資料的收集、整理、分析與跨部門協作，共同累積成長的經驗，並一步步建構對外有影響力的資料服務。我們相信，資料科學能改變決策方式，也能啟發新的解決方案——期待你和我們一起，把這份可能性化為真實。
【你會負責的事情】
協助資料分析（包含進行資料清理、初步探索性資料分析（EDA）等等）
協助撰寫與優化資料相關文件、筆記與標準作業流程（SOP）
協助整理會議記錄、行動要點與任務追蹤
協助進行簡報或提案資料準備
其他主管交辦事項
【我們提供】
建立資料科學團隊的第一手參與與實戰經驗
資料科學小組Lead親自指導與跨部門溝通訓練機會
前矽谷資深工程師擔任技術顧問，協助產品開發與技術成長
真實場域資料應用挑戰
正向支持與學習型工作文化

info-job__text: *️⃣【FinTech_知名金融科技公司｜Sr. Data Engineer (Team Lead)】薪資福利依經驗可談 / 歡迎具具金融產業背景者應徵 ｜BIS_233
info-company__text: 藝珂人事顧問股份有限公司
info-description:
【Job Responsibilities】
• Guide and develop a team of data engineers in building and sustaining robust, scalable ETL pipelines, with a steadfast commitment to data integrity and security best practices.
• Lead the planning and architectural design of data platforms, ensuring they deliver high performance, scalability, and operational reliability under dynamic business needs.
• Partner closely with business and engineering teams to gather data requirements, craft resilient data models, and accelerate the creation and deployment of data-driven solutions.
• Optimize data ecosystems across cloud (e.g., GCP) and on-premises infrastructures, with a strong focus on enhancing system efficiency, scalability, and cost optimization.
• Manage the full project lifecycle for data initiatives — from ideation to implementation — ensuring on-time delivery without compromising on quality or innovation.
• Drive the ongoing advancement of data infrastructure and engineering standards to future-proof the organization’s growth trajectory.
• Offer technical leadership in evaluating and adopting emerging data technologies, while fostering an environment that encourages innovation, agility, and continuous improvement.

【Requirements】
• Minimum of 5 years of relevant experience in data engineering, including at least 2 years in a leadership or mentorship capacity.
• A proven track record in designing, building, and maintaining complex ETL pipelines, with a sharp focus on scalability, resilience, and security.
• Strong backend development skills, including proficiency in shell scripting, SQL, and at least one modern programming language (e.g., Python, Scala).
• Deep expertise in distributed computing engines and data platforms (e.g., ClickHouse, PySpark, Kafka, BigQuery, Airflow).
• Demonstrated success in planning and deploying infrastructure for large-scale data processing and storage ecosystems.
• Hands-on experience with data exploration and visualization tools (e.g., Superset, Tableau), and solid understanding of data lake and data warehouse architectures.
• Practical experience with cloud-native data processing services (e.g., AWS Data Pipelines, GCP Dataflow).
• Familiarity with CDC (Change Data Capture) tools and real-time streaming solutions is highly desirable.
• Strong stakeholder management skills, with the ability to influence and communicate effectively across all organizational levels.
• Experience in setting up or utilizing Data Catalog systems is considered an advantage.
• A passion for cultivating talent, fostering a high-performance, collaborative, and innovative team culture.

【Benefits】
• 舒適的辦公環境。
• 便利的上班地點－捷運站五分鐘距離。
• 彈性的上下班（09:00-18:00 / 10:00-19:00），午休1.5小時。
• 專案獎金、節日禮金、生日禮金、人才推薦獎金。
• 專業在職培訓。
• 正職福利計劃。
• 零食飲料咖啡供應。
• 到職第一年享10天特休、10天全薪病假。(依職等可議)
• 壽星當月生日假。

info-company__text: 國巨股份有限公司
info-description:
Position Overview

YAGEO Corporation, a leading global supplier of electronic components, is seeking an energetic, positive, and customer-focused individual to join our team as a mid-level Business Intelligence Developer. We are looking for a skilled and detail-oriented professional with a passion for analyzing requirements and transforming raw data into actionable insights. The ideal candidate will bring 3-4 years of experience developing in Power BI, including strong expertise in M code and DAX, alongside robust SQL skills and a solid background in data modeling and ETL processes. If you’re excited to drive impactful, data-driven decisions in a global organization and thrive in a dynamic, fast-paced environment, we’d love to hear from you!

Key Responsibilities

-Power BI Development: Design and maintain interactive dashboards and reports in Power BI, leveraging M code and DAX to create compelling, customer-focused data visualizations.
-SQL Proficiency: Write and optimize complex SQL queries to extract, manipulate, and analyze data from various databases, ensuring high performance and scalability.
-ETL Processes: Design and implement ETL workflows to ensure seamless data integration, quality, and availability for reporting and analysis.
-Data Modeling: Develop and maintain logical and physical data models to support reporting, analytics, and business intelligence initiatives, ensuring data accuracy and consistency.
-Collaboration: Partner with cross-functional teams to analyze requirements and deliver data solutions that align with YAGEO’s strategic business objectives.
-Performance Optimization: Monitor and enhance reporting processes, ETL pipelines, and database queries to improve efficiency and reliability.

info-company__text: 立特有限公司
info-description:
----工作內容----
1. 後端系統開發與維護
    *使用 Golang 實作並維護企業後端服務與 API。
    *依照需求設計並優化系統架構與資料庫結構。
2. 資料庫操作與優化
    *使用 PostgreSQL 進行資料庫設計、調校 (tuning) 與維運。
    *使用 Redis 進行快取、Session 管理、即時資料處理。
    *針對時間序列資料，使用 InfluxDB 建立並維護資料存取流程。
3. API 設計與串接
    *設計並開發高效、穩定的 RESTful API 或 GraphQL API。
    *與內部或第三方系統串接，確保資料交換與安全控管。
4. 系統監控與維運
    *建置並維護系統監控、日誌 (logging) 機制。
    *配合 DevOps 流程進行自動化部署與持續整合 (CI/CD)。
5. 與前端或其他團隊協作
    *若為全端工程師，需同時負責前端開發 (以現有框架為主，如 React、Vue 等)。
    *與 PM、設計師或其他工程團隊密切合作，確保專案順利進行。

----職務需求----
1. 必要條件：
    *熟悉 Golang 或者 C++ / C / JAVA 任一種或多種
    *具備使用 PostgreSQL、Redis、InfluxDB 的實務經驗
    *熟悉 API 相關技術 (RESTful、GraphQL 任一種或多種)
    *熟悉 Git 版本控制流程
    *具備良好的程式設計邏輯與解決問題能力
2. 加分項目：
    *熟悉 Docker / Kubernetes 等容器化技術
    *具備前端開發經驗 (React 等框架)
    *對微服務架構 (Microservices)、Message Queue (Kafka、RabbitMQ) 有經驗
    *熟悉 Linux 系統操作與 Shell scripting
3. 軟性條件：
    *具有良好溝通能力與團隊合作精神
    *自主學習、能持續追蹤並學習新技術
    *樂於分享與協作

info-job__text: Performance Engineer 效能分析工程師
info-company__text: 海龍二號風電股份有限公司
info-description:
【KEY RESPONSIBILITIES】
•	Responsible to establish, enhance, and support performance optimization and performance reporting
•	Monitor key performance indicators to determine the overall health and performance of assets
•	Collection, management, verification and further analysis and evaluation of turbine SCADA data that is collected via various turbine systems
•	Collection, management, verification and further analysis and evaluation of BoP SCADA data that is collected via various BoP systems
•	Identify technical issues affecting both turbine performance and the overall performance of the windfarm, recommend solutions and review their effectiveness to support the broader optimisation of wind farm performance.
•	Provide support to the Asset and Operations and Maintenance team to resolve the faults, reliability and efficiency issues detected.
•	Development of diagnostic and predictive analysis methods using Python, R, MATLAB or other scripting languages to quantify, analyse and track wind farm performance
•	Support to help early identification of potential turbine component failures.
•	Prepare and support the site-specific routine analysis/reporting with regards to the mentioned scope.
•	Support the reliability test and power curve test analysis
•	Responsible for the identification of new performance management areas to be supported with new analytics
•	Carrying out Proof of Concepts
•	Ensuring that value generating Proof of Concepts are implemented in the organisation
•	Accountable for making sure that solutions are being documented and processes around them are established
•	Ensure that availability warranties are monitored and evaluated to ensure a prompt and successful resolution of issues with contractors
•	Support in conducting regular commercial reporting on contractual and commercial matter
•	Ensure contractor’s commercial performance and improve when necessary
•	Ensure that the regular commercial/contractual reporting to the CEO and shareholders is automated and integrated to the maximum extent possible
•	Coordinate with internal stakeholders

【QUALIFICATIONS & KEY SKILLS】
•	Bachelor’s or master’s degree in data science educations, physics, engineering and/or mathematical studies or possess similar analyst skills obtained through work experience (+5 Years)
•	Experience working Performance Management of asset preferably within the offshore industry
•	Excellent understanding of SCADA data and energy production method
•	Proficient in Python or other similar programming languages
•	Having a track record of delivering value adding Business Intelligence solutions
•	Used to develop and deliver analysis with a short time to market
•	Experience in delivering into all phases of the process from problem identification to solution finalization
•	Solid analyst background and have a commercial mindset and the ability to work independently.
•	Proficient in programming
•	Proficient in Microsoft Office (PowerPoint, Excel, Outlook)
•	Innovative
•	Systematically in solving issues
•	Strong communication skills (verbal and written)
•	Tenacious self-starter, professional, organized and process driven
•	Able to work independently
•	Self-driven, proactive, and solution-oriented attitude
•	Knowledge of data mining, troubleshooting, and reporting
•	Experience with data analysis, design, database, and visualization tools (e.g., Python, R, SQL, Tableau)
•	Must be comfortable working with large amounts of data

隸屬董事長室的策略幕僚單位，負責長期策略規劃與地緣政治的研究分析。涵蓋集團內於海內外投資的食品、大宗原物料、運動經濟、包材、物流等產業上下游之長期佈局。

This position belongs to the strategic advisory unit within the Office of the Chairman, responsible for long-term strategic planning and geopolitical analysis. It encompasses the long-term layout of the group's upstream and downstream industries, including food, bulk raw materials, sports, packaging, and logistics, for both domestic and international investments.


【工作內容】
如同一個小型智庫，本單位的成員均具備良好的社會科學或理工的學術背景（兩者兼備為優），佐以對商業的敏銳度與解決問題的能力。如果您對國際政經情勢、科技趨勢、全球糧食與原物料領域有興趣、具備相關知識，或有良好邏輯能力，可獨立進行研究與分析，那就是我們在尋找的人才。

1. 研究大宗原物料的價值鏈，提出策略佈局規劃
2. 追蹤全球創投與標竿企業在食農、包材領域的投資與佈局
3. 分析潛在投資、策略合作區域的地緣政治與經濟發展
4. 其他專案執行與研究，與主管交辦事項

Similar to a small think tank, our unit consists of members with strong academic backgrounds in either social sciences or STEM fields (preferably both), combined with business acumen and problem-solving abilities.
If you have an interest in international political and economic situations, technological trends, and the global food and raw materials sectors, possess relevant knowledge, or have strong logical skills to conduct independent research and analysis, you are the talent we are looking for.
1. Research the value chain of bulk raw materials and propose strategic layout plans.
2. Track global venture capital and industry benchmarks in the food, agriculture, and packaging sectors, including their investments and M&A deals.
3. Analyze the geopolitical and economic development processes of potential investment and strategic cooperation regions.
4. Execute other research projects and tasks assigned by the supervisor.

info-company__text: 新加坡商立可人事顧問有限公司台灣分公司
info-description:
公司介紹:
本公司目前旗下共有九家授權經銷商，售前與售後的服務網絡遍及全台，以及在台提供多元化的汽車財務規劃、租賃與保險服務，以整合式的服務，提供給客戶非凡的購車體驗。

Business Intelligence 

Job Summary:
We are seeking a Senior Business Intelligence (BI) and Digitalization Expert with expertise in big data platforms to support data-driven decision-making and drive innovation within the organization. This role combines advanced analytics, business intelligence, and digital transformation strategies to enhance efficiency and business performance. The ideal candidate will leverage Hadoop-related tools and other BI technologies to design scalable analytics solutions, lead digitalization initiatives that modernize and streamline business processes while providing strategic insights to support growth and innovation.

Key Responsibilities:
•	Big Data Management: Working with vendor to utilize to store, manage, and analyze large datasets, enabling effective data-driven decision-making.
•	Data Analysis & Reporting: Analyze complex data sets from Hadoop clusters, relational databases, and other sources; create reports and deliver actionable insights to business stakeholders.
•	BI Solution Development: Design, implement, and maintain BI solutions using both BI tools (e.g., Power BI, Tableau).
•	Data Pipeline Exchange: Collaborate with data providers or front-end system teams to ensure a well-designed data flow with high data quality.
•	Cross-functional Collaboration: Coordinate with various IT teams and partner with departments such as finance, operations, and marketing and aftersales to gather data requirements, address data challenges, and drive analytical projects.
•	Performance Tracking: Develop and monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) using big data methodologies, identifying trends and opportunities for process improvements.
•	Communication Skills: Establish effective communication with business users and vendors, clearly articulating insights, requirements, and technical details to ensure alignment with organizational goals.

Required Qualifications:
•	Education: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Business, or related fields. Advanced degree preferred.
•	Experience: 5+ years of experience in BI, data analysis, or big data environments.
•	Technical Skills:
o	Experience with BI tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI) for reporting and visualizations.
o	Strong SQL skills and familiarity with ETL processes.
o	Digitalization experience also required, like RPA, AI, Machine learning. 
o	Programming experience in Python is a plus.
o	Knowledge of cloud-based data platforms and data lakes is a plus.
•	Analytical Skills: Demonstrated expertise in managing and interpreting large, complex datasets within Hadoop and deriving insights to support strategic decisions.
•	Communication Skills: Clear and concise English communication skills for explaining technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders, business users, and vendor partners.

info-description:
We are looking for a developer specializing in agents based on large language models (LLM) to join an R&D team dedicated to the application of AI in natural language processing and computer vision. This position is part of the Networks and Telecommunications Products division.
Responsibilities
    • Design a next-generation artificial intelligence (AI) agent capable of operating bilingually (Chinese/English). 
    • Integrate advanced features such as automated reception, intelligent call routing, and smart customer service. 
    • Deploy this agent within the private IP-based telephone switch, the flagship product currently promoted by the company. 
    • Optional Assignments: 
        ◦ Develop bilingual SLMs intended for use in embedded systems. 
        ◦ Design SLMs for vision applications to integrate into an intelligent surveillance camera system. 
Required Skills and Experience
    • Conversational Agent Development: Experience in developing and optimizing advanced AI agents. 
    • Enhancing Language Models through Fine-Tuning: Ability to integrate tools or functions that enrich the capabilities of LLMs. 
    • IoT Integration: Experience interfacing LLMs with IoT devices to enable intelligent interactions. 
Assets
    • Advanced Proficiency with Agent Frameworks: Demonstrated expertise in using frameworks such as LangChain, Rasa, and HuggingFace Smolagents, and leveraging them to develop innovative solutions. 
    • Industrial Deployment Experience with LLMs: Proven track record in implementing and industrializing large-scale language models, ensuring performance and robustness in professional environments. 
    • Additional Assets: Familiarity with reinforcement learning or expertise in Mixture of Experts will be considered a significant advantage, enhancing your ability to innovate in ambitious projects.

This role is critical to ensuring the accuracy, stability, and scalability of our data infrastructure, which is essential for the firm’s investment operations. The candidate will work closely with researchers, traders, and technology teams to drive data-driven decision-making and enhance system performance.

This role offers a unique opportunity to cultivate and develop top talent within the Data Team, collaborating closely with the CEO, data statisticians, and traders to build models from the ground up. As a key contributor to our data infrastructure, the Data Engineer will be responsible for designing, implementing, and optimizing robust data systems. 
We foster a culture of open problem-solving, encouraging a balance between intellectual depth and practical implementation to drive innovation and excellence.


Roles/ Responsibilities:

•	Develop and maintain scalable data pipelines to ensure efficient and fault-tolerant data processing.
•	Manage data collection, storage, cleansing, and transformation to enhance data quality and usability.
•	Experience in developing ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) processes using C++ is a plus, along with proficiency in Python for maintenance.
•	Implement and optimize MLOps methodologies to support scalable and reliable machine learning infrastructure.
•	Test and integrate APIs to facilitate seamless data exchange across internal and external systems.
•	Collaborate cross-functionally with investment, research, and engineering teams to deliver efficient data solutions tailored to business needs.


Required Skills: 
•	6+ years of experience as a Data Engineer.
•	Extensive expertise in data collection, storage, and cleaning, with a strong preference for candidates who have built data systems from the ground up.
•	Strong technical skills in SQL, NoSQL (MongoDB, Cassandra), Spark, Hadoop, Python, Airflow, ETL, Data Warehousing, and Cloud platforms (AWS/GCP/Azure).
•	Experience with Kubernetes (k8s) for deployment is preferred.


Preferred Qualifications:	
•	MS/BS in Computer Science or a related engineering field is preferred.
•	Working proficiency in English skills (oral and written)


Other Requirement:	
•	Resilient, proactive, and optimistic, with strong critical thinking skills.
•	Goal-oriented mindset, willing to put in the effort, and passionate about data research-related work.
•	Passionate about exploring AI tools such as AgentSDK and MC and have experience integrating data workflow tools like Cline and Cursor is a plus. 


Interview Process (Process sequencing may be adjusted as appropriate)
Resume selection -->Coding Assessment ->  F2F or Google Meet Interview( Hiring team) --> HR Manager

info-job__text: 【兼職／接案】資料工程師（財報與非結構化處理) Data Engineer – Financial Statement & Unstructured Data Processing
info-company__text: 艾利克投資有限公司
info-description:
資料工程師（財報與非結構化資料處理）
Data Engineer – Financial Statement & Unstructured Data Processing

【工作內容】
・開發與維護資料擷取流程，從公開資訊觀測站、API、PDF 等來源收集台灣上市櫃公司的財務報表與公告文件。
・將原始資料結構化並轉換為標準格式（如 CSV、Parquet、資料庫)，供因子研究與量化策略使用。
・建立財務指標計算模組(如 ROE、自由現金流、負債比等)，並分析其分布特性與預測效果。
・提升資料處理模組的可重複使用性與維護性，確保資料品質穩定。
・具備處理 OCR、PDF 文字擷取、多語言解析或 LLM/NLP 自動摘要能力者尤佳。

Job Responsibilities
・Build and maintain data pipelines to collect financial statements and disclosures from sources such as MOPS, APIs, and PDFs.
・Transform raw documents into structured formats (CSV, Parquet, databases) for use in factor analysis and strategy development.
・Develop financial metric modules (e.g., ROE, FCF, debt ratio) and evaluate factor distribution and predictive performance.
・Ensure data processing workflows are modular, reusable, and maintainable.
・Bonus if experienced with OCR, multilingual PDF parsing, or LLM/NLP summarization.

【我們希望你具備】
・熟悉 Python 及資料處理工具（pandas、numpy、re、BeautifulSoup、requests 等）。
・了解財報架構與基本會計原則，具備財報結構化處理經驗者尤佳。
・具資料清理、欄位標準化與缺失值處理等實務能力。
・具 PDF 擷取、OCR、NLP/LLM 等處理經驗者加分。
・能與策略研究人員協作，確保資料品質並提升應用效率。

Preferred Qualifications
・Proficient in Python and data libraries (pandas, numpy, re, BeautifulSoup, requests).
・Experience structuring financial data and understanding accounting basics is preferred.
・Skilled in data cleaning, field normalization, and handling missing values.
・Plus for experience with PDF extraction, OCR, or NLP/LLM tools.
・Strong team player who can communicate with researchers to enhance data quality and usability.

【合作方式】 
・專案合作制
・時間彈性，可遠端協作  
・薪資依任務複雜度、產出量與驗證精度彈性評估
・可與資料儲存、因子研發、策略建模等模組協作，長期合作優先考慮

Collaboration & Compensation
・Part-time or project-based, remote and flexible, deliverable-oriented.
・Compensation based on project complexity, output volume, and validation rigor.
・Opportunities to collaborate with other modules, with preference for long-term contributors.

info-job__text: 【AI節能-機器學習資料工程師】彈性上班/同事可愛/福利多多
info-company__text: 台灣愛淨節能科技股份有限公司
info-company-addon-type: 其他專業／科學及技術業
info-description:
一起讓世界更節能！愛淨節能等你來！

嘿！你是不是也想用科技改變世界？
我們正在尋找一位具有創造力和熱情的機器學習資料工程師，負責開發和維護我們的預測模型及演算法。

讓我們一起將AI節能方案做得更好，推廣到世界各地，讓世界更美好！

【職位需求】

- 了解冷凍空調能源相關領域知識，以效率為前提，應用 ML 來解決能源領域常見的痛點

- 開發或維護 ML 的相關產品：製冷量預測、最佳化預測等

- 優化既有 ML 產品的效能 / 使用者體驗 / 維護性，同時確保正確性

- 負責將新計畫從研究到產品化，規劃建立 ML 的流程系統，包含抓取既有資料、設計收集使用者 label 資料、資料前處理儲存、模型設計、線上部署等等

職務需求
【必要條件】

- 資工相關領域碩士或2年以上 ML 產品開發經驗，熟悉產品週期不同階段的需求重點

- 了解 Machine Learning 的基本原理

- 熟悉 Design Pattern、Clean Code、Clean Architecture ，能夠寫出將商務邏輯與開發細節分乾淨，讓程式碼更容易測試、修改與擴展

- 熟悉 Python 與 Tensorflow、Pytorch、Keras 其一，能夠寫出高效能的資料處理程式

- 熟悉 資料結構、演算法、作業系統、網路架構等基礎知識，能夠分析效能瓶頸

- 熟悉 Linux / Docker / SQL 的架設使用

Xelay Acumen Analysts are a diverse group of highly qualified people with a wide range of backgrounds, from hard science to business. Offered challenging responsibilities, broad business exposure and unrivaled career prospects, Xelay Acumen’s Analysts are provided an unparalleled opportunity to apply knowledge, business intuition, and analytical rigor to real-world challenges, building invaluable skills and experience along the way. It's a great way to set yourself up for future success—at Xelay Acumen and beyond. Candidates with all experience levels and backgrounds are encouraged to apply.

The Taipei Analyst role is a full-time position to support strategic evaluations, analyses, and communications of clinical, medical, and market data within the biotechnology, pharmaceutical, and healthcare provider industry, and collaborate with global Xelay team members to accomplish project engagement goals and objectives.  

Analysts at Xelay Acumen tackle the most advanced and difficult problems our clients face that drive bottom-line financial returns and create tremendous value, including
• Creating compelling communications of critical information
• Designing and developing visualizations of data and concepts to vastly improve audience engagement and understanding
• Conducting clinical trial data analytics and design
• Developing and writing medical publications and communications with novel analyses and compelling visualizations
• Researching to understand and shape new markets
• Framing new business and medical treatment models
• Assessing specific competitors' performance
• Performing due diligence

[Development]
1 of the 5 core values at Xelay is to “develop our people”. This value goes beyond being a mere statement—it is a dedicated promise to invest in the personal and professional evolution of every individual within our organization. At Xelay, we have cultivated an environment where learning is seamlessly integrated into our daily operations. We actively engage our team members in real client engagements, providing them with hands-on responsibilities that not only challenge and stretch their abilities but also accelerate their professional growth. This approach fosters a sense of ownership and accomplishment among our team members.

Our commitment to developing people extends to comprehensive training in consulting, leadership, and communication. This training is complemented by several offsite sessions throughout the year and biweekly meetings with mentors. We understand that each individual's journey is unique, and therefore, we offer personalized development plans tailored to the aspirations and goals of our team members. By championing a “people developing culture”, we empower our team members to excel in their current roles and prepare them for future leadership positions. We firmly believe that our investment in their growth is an investment in the overall success of our company.

Analysts are our frontline in developing powerful insights and driving results for our clients. We invest heavily in our Analysts and believe in the apprenticeship model of management consulting. At Xelay Acumen Taipei, you will gain frequent professional development and consulting skills as well as a global network of like-minded colleagues that will prepare you for your time at Xelay and beyond.

[Responsibilities]
Analysts at Xelay Acumen quickly acquire the core capabilities of a successful, trustworthy team member through the following responsibilities:
• Manage individual workstreams
• Structure and solve challenging problems to address critical business issues
• Create compelling storylines and visualizations to accomplish critical communication challenges 
• Perform complex clinical trial and web survey data analyses in support of ad-hoc and ongoing projects
•Synthesize medical literature and communications into key takeaways and implications for clients
• Develop programs, methodologies, and files for analyzing and presenting data

info-company__text: 博彥科技有限公司
info-description:
Overview 

As a Data Analyst at Microsoft, you will play a pivotal role in extracting actionable insights from data. Your work will directly impact decision-making processes, product development, and business strategies. If you’re passionate about data-driven solutions and enjoy translating raw information into meaningful narratives, this role is for you. 

Responsibilities 

Business Understanding and Anticipation: 

Proactively anticipate business questions by closely collaborating with stakeholders. Understand their needs and identify potential data-driven inquiries. 

Streamline Data Processes: 

Leverage Kusto Query to extract the data log from Cloud Apps/Services. 

Use tools to automate workflows and streamline data processes. 

Design and implement automated solutions to improve efficiency. 

Data Exploration and Cleaning: 

Dive into raw data from various sources. Profile and clean data to ensure accuracy and reliability. 

Apply data transformation techniques (aggregation, filtering, normalization) to prepare it for analysis. 

Data Modeling and Integration: 

Design scalable data models that accommodate growth and changing requirements. 

Determine optimal methods for integrating data from diverse sources (databases, APIs, flat files). 

Advanced Analytics and Visualization: 

Leverage tools like Power BI to create insightful visualizations. 

Develop interactive dashboards that provide real-time insights and facilitate data-driven decision-making. 

Implement advanced analytics techniques (modeling, clustering, trend analysis) to extract valuable insights. 

Ensure visualizations are user-friendly and accessible to both technical and non-technical stakeholders. 

Key Performance Indicators (KPIs): 

Curate and maintain KPIs that track progress toward business goals. 

Develop dashboards and reports that provide a holistic view of performance metrics. 

Collaboration and Communication: 

Work closely with business teams to identify data requirements. 

Communicate findings effectively to both technical and non-technical audiences. 

Qualifications 

Bachelor’s degree in a relevant field (Computer Science, Statistics, Business Analytics, etc.) 

Proficiency in SQL, Python, or R 

Experience with data visualization tools (Power BI, Grafana, etc.) 

Experience with creating live dashboards is a plus. 

Strong understanding of Power BI, including its features and functionalities is a plus. 

Knowledge of Automation Tool (Power Automate, etc.) 

Knowledge of Kusto Query Language (KQL) 

Strong analytical mindset and problem-solving skills 

Excellent communication and collaboration abilities

info-job__text: Specialist, Data Analytics or Data Visualization/Graphics, Taipei
info-company__text: 世銳顧問有限公司
info-description:
Position Description
Xelay Acumen Specialists are a diverse group of highly qualified people with a wide range of backgrounds, from hard science to business. Offered challenging responsibilities, broad business exposure and unrivaled career prospects, Xelay Acumen’s Specialists are provided an unparalleled opportunity to apply knowledge, business intuition, and analytical rigor to real-world challenges, building invaluable skills and experience along the way. It's a great way to set yourself up for future success—at Xelay Acumen and beyond. Candidates with all experience levels and backgrounds are encouraged to apply.

The Taipei Specialist role is a full-time position to support strategic evaluations, analyses, and communications of clinical, medical, and market data within the biotechnology, pharmaceutical, and healthcare provider industry, and collaborate with global Xelay team members to accomplish project engagement goals and objectives.  

Specialists at Xelay Acumen tackle the most advanced and difficult problems our clients face that drive bottom-line financial returns and create tremendous value, including

•	Creating compelling communications of critical information
•	Designing and developing visualizations of data and concepts to vastly improve audience engagement and understanding
•	Conducting clinical trial data analytics and design
•	Developing and writing medical publications and communications with novel analyses and compelling visualizations
•	Researching to understand and shape new markets
•	Framing new business and medical treatment models
•	Assessing specific competitors' performance
•	Performing due diligence

Responsibilities
Specialists at Xelay Acumen quickly acquire the core capabilities of a successful, trustworthy team member through the following responsibilities:

[Analytics Specialist]
•	Develop programs, methodologies, and files for analyzing and presenting data 
•	Use and support database applications and analytical tools: evaluate data quality, applications, and functions, produce output, maintain data assets
•	Research new data sources and analytical tools; contribute to new product development and improvement in product delivery and presentation
•	Perform complex clinical trial and web survey data analyses in support of ad-hoc and ongoing projects

[Data Visualization Specialist]
•	Interpret and organize data results, literature research and market research into executive summaries and professional consulting presentations
•	Create compelling storylines and visualizations to accomplish critical communication challenges 
•	Synthesize medical literature and communications into key takeaways and implications for the Client

Both types of specialists can expect the following responsibilities:
•	Manage individual workstreams
•	and provide timely feedback from managers and team members
•	Create, refine, and present recommendations to senior management
•	Structure and solve challenging problems to address critical business issues

info-company__text: 克耐得資訊有限公司
info-description:
【Company Overview】: 
ContactLoop is dedicated to providing cutting-edge solutions for contact management and operational efficiency. Our client operations team plays a vital role in ensuring that new clients and campaigns are successfully onboarded and optimized for maximum performance. We are committed to fostering a collaborative environment that supports professional growth and innovation!


【Job Summary】: 
We are looking for a data-driven and detail-oriented Junior Data Analyst to join our Operations team. This role plays a key part in analyzing performance metrics, improving campaign efficiency, and providing actionable insights to improve client campaign performance. The ideal candidate will have a foundation in data analysis, with the ability to develop and implement strategies that optimize campaign results. 


【Responsibilities】:
• Regularly review and assess campaign data to identify performance trends and 
   areas for improvement.
• Track key performance indicators (KPIs) and ensure campaigns are aligned with 
   business objectives.
• Analyze numbers from various different reports, and be able to identify patterns, 
   and picture outcomes and gaps and propose effective solutions to enhance 
   campaign performance.
• Compile and summarize key findings from performance data, highlighting business 
   impact and actionable insights.
• Communicate data insights clearly and effectively to stakeholders across the 
   organization.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver data-driven insights that 
   support strategic decision-making.
• Identify inefficiencies in data management, or related processes; recommend and 
   implement improvements to enhance workflow efficiency.
• Utilize project management tools like Monday.com to track day-to-day tasks and 
   drive continuous improvement initiatives.


【Requirements】:
• English fluency is must.
• Bachelors degree in Business, Finance, Marketing, or a related field.
• Open to recent graduates with a strong interest in data and campaign performance 
   analysis, and willing to learn and gather hands-on experience. 


【Must-Have Skills】:
• Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret data, spot trends, and 
   recommend actionable solutions.
• Ability to identify performance gaps and process inefficiencies, and propose 
   effective solutions.
• Flexibility to adjust strategies based on evolving business needs.
• Demonstrated ability to take initiative in identifying opportunities for process and 
   performance improvements.
• High level of accuracy and attention to detail.
• Ability to quickly adapt and learn in a fast-changing startup environment.


【Nice to have】:
• Experience with project management and collaboration tools like Monday.com, 
   Trello, etc.
• Experience in a SaaS or tech environment, particularly in a startup, is a plus.
• Familiarity with tools such as Excel, SQL, Retool, and other relevant BI tools.


【More About Onramp Lab】
Onramp Lab, the parent organization, is known for building brands with online-to-offline omnichannel marketing capabilities, especially in paid search, display, native, paid social, SEO, email and affiliate marketing across Google, Yahoo, Bing, Facebook, LinkedIn and more. Onramp professionals drive measurable value to multiple wholly owned and partnered companies through strategic guidance and subsequent execution in performance marketing, UX/CRO, and revenue optimization. Today, the Onramp Lab has organized a talented and strong Tech team to automatize success strategies and insight into software evolving into a technology-driven marketing/sales company.

acts as the local data lead on building the data strategy of local projects in partnership with the FSN and WFJ client intelligence managers.

info-company__text: 美商賽美斯醫學科技有限公司
info-description:
▌Position Description:
We are seeking a skilled and motivated R Programmer to join our dynamic team focused on clinical trials. The successful candidate will play a key role in the development, validation, and analysis of R codes and packages tailored for clinical trial data. This position requires a strong background in statistical programming, data manipulation, and a proactive approach to problem-solving.

▌Key Responsibilities:
1. Code Development: 
    ▪ Actively participate in the development of R codes and packages specifically designed for clinical trials.

2. Validation: 
    ▪ Perform thorough validation of codes and analyses to ensure accuracy, reliability, and compliance with regulatory standards.

3. Programming Expertise: 
    ▪ Independently design, develop, and debug R programs ranging from simple to complex within defined project timelines.

4. Statistical Analysis: 
    ▪ Independently implement statistical analysis, data preparation, and data manipulation using R programs and packages.

5. Report Generation: 
    ▪ Independently create statistical tables, figures, and listings in R for clinical trial data, contributing to the production of high-quality reports.

6. Documentation: 
    ▪ Create and maintain comprehensive documentation for R programs, validation procedures, and results to facilitate transparency and reproducibility.

7. Collaboration: 
    ▪ Collaborate with cross-functional teams, providing programming support and expertise as needed.

8. Project Assistance: 
    ▪ Assist in the preparation of clinical/RWE study reports, manuscripts, and other scientific documents under the guidance of senior team members.

9. Adaptability: 
    ▪ Perform additional tasks as assigned, demonstrating flexibility and a proactive approach to evolving project needs.

▌Qualificaions:
•	Advanced knowledge of R programming
•	Strong understanding of biostatistical principles
•	Highly detail oriented, results driven
•	Good organizational, interpersonal, leadership and communication skills
•	Ability to independently manage multiple tasks and projects
•	Minimum BS (MS preferred) in Data Sciences, Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Sciences or related field.
•	1+ years of experience in data sciences or research or drug industry using R.
•	Experiences in R-shiny, SAS, Python, clinical trials are plus.
•	Good documentation, communication and organization skills.

info-description:
We are seeking a skilled and experienced Data Analyst (Marketing) with 3-5 years of expertise in data analysis and marketing analytics. The ideal candidate will be responsible for collecting, cleaning, analyzing, and visualizing marketing data to provide actionable insights that drive marketing strategies. This role requires close collaboration with the Marketing Director and other cross-functional teams, and the ability to clearly communicate complex findings to stakeholders. 

- Data Collection and Preparation: Proficiently gather data from diverse sources including Google Analytics, CRM systems, and marketing automation platforms. Prepare and integrate data for analysis using tools such as Excel and SQL. 

- Data Cleaning and Transformation: Identify and address complex data quality issues. Use advanced Excel or SQL techniques to clean, transform, and prepare data for thorough analysis. 

- Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA): Utilize statistical techniques to perform in-depth analysis in Excel, R, or Python. Uncover trends, patterns, and correlations that can inform marketing strategies. 

- Data Visualization: Create visually compelling and insightful dashboards, charts, and reports using Power BI or Tableau to communicate findings to stakeholders in a clear and actionable manner. 

- Documentation: Maintain meticulous and comprehensive documentation of data analysis processes, methodologies, and outcomes for future reference and reproducibility. 

- Collaboration: Work closely with the Marketing Director and cross-functional teams to understand business objectives, provide actionable insights, and support data-driven marketing decisions. Use tools such as Teams and Asana for communication and project management.

info-company__text: 威旭資訊股份有限公司
info-description:
We are seeking a Senior Data Scientist with 6-8 years of experience in high-dimensional financial data analysis and machine learning optimization to drive data-driven decision-making.
Ideal candidates have a strong technical foundation and a passion for FinTech. We value critical thinking, data-driven decision-making, and innovation in data strategy, with a focus on refining algorithms and system architectures to enhance predictive accuracy and efficiency. 
This role offers a unique opportunity to cultivate and develop top talent, collaborating closely with the CEO, data statisticians, and traders to build models from the ground up. 
We foster a culture of open problem-solving, encouraging a balance between intellectual depth and practical implementation to drive innovation and excellence.

Roles/ Responsibilities:

Financial Data Analysis & Modeling
•	Conduct model monitoring and back-testing to validate model stability and effectiveness.
•	Explore market sentiment analysis using NLP/CV/LLM-based algorithms, applying insights to financial news, earnings reports, and other data sources.
•	Develop AI-driven applications for automated news analysis, investment recommendations, and risk management decision-making.
•	Continuously monitor and refine ML models to adapt to evolving market conditions.

Risk Management & Anomaly Detection
•	Research anomaly detection techniques to identify irregularities in financial data.
•	Design risk control models to monitor and mitigate extreme market fluctuations.

Required Skills: 
•	Technical Skills: Proficiency in Python, SQL, R (C++ is a plus). Experience with Spark, Kafka, and advanced data processing. Strong capability in machine learning model optimization.
•	Hands-on experience with high-complexity data processing. Prior exposure to financial data modeling is a plus.
•	Algorithm Knowledge: Deep understanding of statistics, machine learning, deep learning, time-series analysis, pattern recognition, computer vision, and NLP.

Preferred Qualifications:	
•	Bachelor's, Master's, or Ph.D. degree in Data Science, Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Mathematics, or a related field is highly preferred.
•	English proficiency is a plus.

Other Requirement:	
•	Self-motivated individual with good communication skills.
•	Personal Attributes: Ability to tackle high-pressure technical challenges in a fast-paced financial environment. Highly goal-oriented, passionate about the field, and proactive in providing effective solutions.
•	English proficiency is a plus.

Interview Process (Process sequencing may be adjusted as appropriate)
Resume selection -->Coding Assessment ->  F2F or Google Meet Interview( Hiring team) --> HR Manager

info-description:
- About the job
Drive digital transformation in supply planning by designing and maintaining system-driven, scenario-based planning models.

This role sits within the IT digital supply chain team, focusing on planning system architecture and data modeling rather than daily planning operations. You will help enhance the group's decision-making quality and response speed through advanced digital planning tools and data structures.
- What you'll do
1. Kinaxis Supply Planning Model – Requirement Analysis, Development, and Continuous Improvement
Translate business needs into executable data model structures. The modeling scope includes, but is not limited to: multi-site, multi-calendar, critical materials, critical capacity, and planning BOM.
2. Data Validation and Data Model Specification
Provide and validate essential data inputs for planning models. Deliver data model specifications to support system development and integration.
3. Cross-functional Collaboration
Collaborate with cross-functional teams—including brand, sales, production planning, and procurement—to review model outcomes, validate business requirements, and align on practical, balanced solutions.

info-description:
上洋產業過去四十年來代理商用洗衣設備，提供全方位洗烘衣服務，業務跨足校園宿舍自助洗衣服務、連鎖自助洗衣店面加盟、精緻洗衣服務等。近年來上洋產業致力於產業轉型，利用資訊技術 (包含物聯網、電子支付等) 將科技元素引入洗衣服務，讓傳統的一般消費轉化為科技生活，也為企業永續提升帶來新契機。
現投入研發多年已陸續獲有成果，科技洗衣也逐漸獲得消費者及客戶重視，我們將持續推動各項資訊計畫，將實際在線下運作的服務轉到線上，並提供更多B2B/B2C 加值解決方案。我們需要更多資訊產業界新血的加入，也鼓勵同仁提出更多的生活科技化創意，並且能在上洋產業獲得實現。
持續穩健成長、鼓勵內部新創，是我們企業追求的目標，期待您的加入。

工作內容 
◆ 參與資訊系統與產品開發設計
◆ 依據使用者或流程管理師提出的需求進行分析、系統設計
◆ 與介接廠商溝通確認規格
◆ 撰寫需求、分析、與規格文件 
◆ 與團隊、介接廠商進行軟體測試計畫/案例編寫與測試執行和驗證 
◆ 透過資料分析產品使用狀況，持續改進，解決問題

必要條件
◆ 良好的溝通能力 (理解、表達能力)
◆ 能透過文件與溝通，了解現有流程與系統，並能將彙整後的資訊製作成規格文件
◆ 有 WEB-based 系統分析實務經驗，具備 API 設計概念 
◆ 有新系統建置、跨系統整合規劃的經驗
◆ 熟悉軟體開發流程、專案管理，有使用專案管理系統經驗，如: Redmine, Jira

info-job__text: 【AI Lab】資料科學家 Senior Data Scientist
info-company__text: 愛卡拉互動媒體股份有限公司
info-description:
【Job Description】

We are seeking a data scientist to address business challenges and fulfill the needs of the product team through data science and machine learning methodologies. This role involves transforming research outcomes—such as models or metrics derived from specific calculations—into scalable products, while also maintaining and supporting existing products.

【Responsibility】

- Define problems from a data science perspective based on business scenarios and propose actionable solutions derived from analytical results.
- Independently execute assigned development or experimental projects, including model training, feature extraction and transformation (ETL), and general analytical tasks.
- Communicate and explain our research projects to other cross-functional teams, ensuring stakeholders understand our deliverables and insights.

【Must Have】
1. A degree in mathematics, statistics, or a related field.
2. Proven experience in developing machine learning models and bringing them into production.
3. Practical experience in designing product performance evaluation metrics.
4. Familiarity with the design and implementation of A/B testing, with the ability to independently analyze test results.
5.Proficient with tools such as Python, PostgreSQL, BigQuery, and Trino.
6.Excellent communication skills and a collaborative team spirit, capable of working closely with both technical and non-technical teams.

# Nice to Have#

1. Hands-on experience with fundamental technologies including Docker and Kubernetes.
2. Hands-on experience with common scheduling tools like Airflow or Argo Workflow.

More Info>>>https://www.ikala.tv

info-company__text: 睿控網安股份有限公司
info-description:
About TXOne Networks
TXOne Networks provides cybersecurity solutions for ICS and OT environments using the OT zero trust methodology. We collaborate with top manufacturers and infrastructure operators to develop practical defense strategies that eliminate security vulnerabilities in industrial settings. TXOne ensures the availability of industrial systems by mitigating cybersecurity challenges that can disrupt operations. Our solutions empower customers to benefit from networked control systems while maintaining operational resilience, personnel safety, and asset security. TXOne Networks is honored to be named one of the top-10 Hottest IoT startup by CRN this Jul.


Job Summary
As a TXOne AI Engineer in AI team, you will be part of a high performance team that focuses on ICS and OT Cybersecurity solutions. We are seeking a highly skilled AI Engineer to work with product/security team in developing advanced AI-driven security solutions. The ideal candidate will bring a deep understanding of machine learning (ML), deep learning (DL), and Generative AI (GenAI) concepts, with a strong ability to implement practical applications. This role involves designing and implementing models that can process and analyze data derived from various sources, including files and network packets. The successful candidate will possess strong hands-on coding skills, proficiency in AI frameworks such as TensorFlow or PyTorch, and experience in transforming raw data into actionable model inputs for predictions and inference.

Key Responsibilities
Your role may be in one or more of these areas:
•	Research and select the most suitable machine learning or deep learning models based on use-case requirements, data patterns, and performance needs.
•	Develop and deploy AI/ML models tailored for security applications, ensuring they can accurately interpret and process data from diverse sources such as files and network packets.
•	Design and optimize preprocessing pipelines to transform raw data into high-quality input for AI models.
•	Collaborate with security experts to understand data patterns, threat vectors, and operational requirements, applying this understanding to enhance model design.
•	Develop tools to visualize, test, and validate AI model performance and ensure they meet security industry standards.
•	Collaborate with the engineering team to integrate AI models into security products, ensuring reliable performance and scalability.
•	Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in AI, ML, and security technologies, recommending improvements to maintain a competitive edge.

Why TXOne Networks?
-	Shape the Future: Be part of a team that’s at the forefront of Networking Security technology.  
-	Collaborative Environment: Work with dynamic and talented professionals who are passionate about innovation.
-	Impactful Role: Play a critical role in driving the success of our groundbreaking products.

Ready to make your mark in Networking Security? Join TXOne Networks and be a catalyst for the future of connectivity!


Equal Opportunities Statement
At TXOne Networks, we embrace change, empower people, and encourage innovation in a connected world. Our diversity and multicultural workforce are key contributing factors to our success across the globe. We like to have fun while taking our culture seriously. We are an equal opportunity employer and are committed to this regardless of race, colour, religion, sex, nationality, age, citizenship, sexual orientation, marital status, gender identity or veteran status. We do not allow discrimination or harassment of any kind.

info-company__text: 瑞典商普爾斯信息科技股份有限公司台灣分公司
info-company-addon-type: 其他電子零組件相關業
info-description:
We help retailers all over the world solve some key in-store challenges, like meeting the New Retail demands and improving store operations and task management. We are a catalyst for retail digitization. By creating game-changing technology and services that are easy to use, adopt and scale, we are making our customers successful in a fully connected world. Our ESLs are designed and engineered in Sweden, and we carefully examine every detail of the product to ensure the highest possible quality.

Today, Pricer is the only ESL provider working with the reliable and scalable optical wireless communications system in the near infrared spectrum. This means that our labels consume considerably less energy than other communication systems while maintaining fast and agile performance and industry-leading battery life.
----------------
Results-driven Data Engineer with strong expertise in designing and managing large-scale data infrastructure on Google Cloud Platform (GCP). Experienced in building robust, scalable data pipelines and architectures for both batch and real-time processing. Proven track record of enabling data-driven decision-making through efficient data integration, transformation, and warehousing solutions.
In addition, software engineering skills are nice to have in this position. It combines backend engineering, data processing, and cloud-native architecture experience to enable reliable, performant, and secure data systems.

Key Competence:
• GCP Services: Expert in BigQuery, Dataflow, Pub/Sub, Cloud Storage, Cloud Composer, and Cloud Functions or similar tools from other cloud providers.
• Data Engineering: Strong in building ETL/ELT pipelines using Dataflow, Composer (Airflow), and BigQuery; proficient in data ingestion from APIs, streaming sources, and files.
• Data Warehousing: Skilled in dimensional modeling, schema design, and performance optimization in BigQuery (partitioning, clustering).
• Programming & Scripting: Proficient in Python and SQL for data workflows; experience with Java/Scala in streaming contexts.
• DevOps & Automation: Hands-on with Terraform for IaC, CI/CD pipelines, and version control for data infrastructure.
• Security & Governance: Knowledge of IAM roles, VPC Service Controls, data encryption, and compliance frameworks (e.g., GDPR, HIPAA).
• Monitoring & Logging: Familiar with GCP’s Cloud Monitoring, Logging, and audit tools for pipeline observability and SLA management.
• Collaboration & Agile Delivery: Adept at working with cross-functional teams, including data analysts and scientists; strong documentation and stakeholder communication skills.
