info-company__text: 台灣寶格麗股份有限公司
info-description:
MISSION STATEMENT

BVLGARI is seeking a highly motivated and detail-oriented Business Analysis talent to join our team in Taiwan. The successful candidate will be responsible for Financial Planning & Analysis (FP&A) and internal control for ERICA review, ensuring optimal financial performance and compliance with internal standards. This role is an individual contributor position, requiring the ability to work independently and collaborate with cross-functional teams.

MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES

Financial Planning & Analysis (FP&A):

•	Develop and manage budgets, forecasts, and financial plans for Bulgari Taiwan.
•	Conduct variance analysis to identify and explain differences between actual and planned results.
•	Submit weekly sales reports, weekly sales landing forecasts, and monthly sales reports by channel and product category.
•	Ensure accurate and timely month-end closing and prepare monthly P&L review in collaboration with accounting teams.
•	Analyze key financial metrics such as revenue, expenses, profitability, CAPEX, and cash flow.
•	Present financial insights and recommendations to management.
•	Collaborate with business units to provide financial support and guidance.
•	Evaluate CAPEX investment proposals and assess their financial viability.
•	Develop and maintain financial models using Excel and other Power BI tools to forecast future performance and evaluate different scenarios.
•	Prepare OPEX reports for each department to monitor budget usage
•	Develop and manage budgets, forecasts, and financial plans for Bulgari Taiwan.
•	Conduct variance analysis to identify and explain differences between actual and planned results.


Internal Control for ERICA Review:
•	Implement and maintain internal control procedures to ensure compliance with ERICA standards.
•	Monitor and evaluate the effectiveness of internal controls and make necessary adjustments.
•	Identify opportunities to improve financial processes and systems, including automation to increase efficiency.
•	Finalize testing and work program files for controls such as credit notes, customer refunds, chargebacks approval, supplier creation/modification procedures, sales & cash reconciliation, and bank signatories/payment approval.
•	Follow up on all action plans in the ERICA platform and update the ERICA Assessment to monitor maturity rate growth and achieve targets.
•	Formalize testing activities using the revamped testing files shared by LVMH and save them in the Teams Directory.
•	Improve the key focus of the Competitive Bidding Process, 3-Way Match, AC Third Party Due Diligence, and International Sanction controls.

info-company-addon-type: 其他專業／科學及技術業
info-description:
我們正在協助政府與企業規劃數位轉型與淨零永續議題的因應策略，落實永續成長的理念。如果您對數位轉型、淨零永續、政策規劃、策略顧問等主題有興趣，並且期待能夠與業界專家和政策制定者交流，以及發揮影響力帶來改變，非常歡迎您加入我們。

在這裡，您將有機會：1.投入政策規劃，協助政府設計數位轉型或淨零永續相關政策，例如發展數位永續雙軸轉型策略、2.參與策略顧問，幫助企業發展目標推動策略，例如發展數位轉型或淨零排放藍圖、3.參與跨領域團隊合作，協助客戶解決問題。

#關於我們
工研院產業科技國際策略發展所(簡稱:產科國際所)，是政府與產業均仰賴的智庫，結合產業研究與國際業務推動能量，以協助台灣產業布局全球市場為己任，以『促進台灣產業科技創新與價值提升』為願景。
旗下經營的IEK產業情報網已超過15年歷史，是國內產業情報資料庫的領導品牌。

IEK產業情報網：http://ieknet.iek.org.tw/

info-company__text: 新加坡商蝦皮娛樂電商有限公司台灣分公司
info-description:
Business Intelligence Data Analyst ensures that Shopee conducts trustworthy and reliable operational decisions. Your contribution, whether it is forming insights or resolving business issues, will facilitate our leaders in making corporate strategic decisions. You will be able to work in a dynamic environment with peers proficient in multiple diverse fields, aiming to resolve business problems or create key insights for the company. 

You are passionate about learning new metrics, interacting with colleagues from different backgrounds, and getting various project management experiences. You will provide data-driven consultation to help colleagues to complete their daily business issues. In this role, we expect you to be experts in translating business ideas into practical data-driven solutions.

Working at Shopee requires an aggressive attitude. We are constantly adapting to new business models and organizational changes. We are open to any kind of discussion and encourage teammates to develop in their own specific areas. From data processing to data analysis, you would encounter endless possibilities with E-commerce data and potentially create substantial impacts on millions of Shopee users once you devote yourself to this position.

Job Description:
●Project management in providing data consultation to business departments on analysis metrics, data application, and current database collections.
●Work together with other departments on report design, metric defining, and insight finding to collaboratively improve performance tracking.
●Conduct data-driven analysis to support internal strategic planning.
●Help Shopee Taiwan build up the data roadmap, and establish consistent metrics for analysis structure. 
●Facilitate cross-departments in Shopee Taiwan to focus on key business decisions to improve products and services from a data-driven perspective.

Basic Requirements: 
●Relevant project management experience and conduct as a good coordinator and communicator. Ability to turn business problems into data-driven solutions.
●A logical thinker who enjoys providing solid business summaries and suggestions to internal departments from a data-driven perspective. 
●A good presenter to communicate data analysis insight to audiences with different backgrounds.
●Comprehensive understanding of data structure with a slick sense of translating business inquiries to practical data.
●Hands-on experience in SQL, business dashboards, and analysis models.

info-company__text: 世銳顧問有限公司
info-description:
Xelay Acumen Data Science Analysts are a diverse group of highly qualified people with a wide range of backgrounds. Offered challenging responsibilities, broad business exposure and unrivaled career prospects, Xelay Acumen’s Data Science Analysts are provided an unparalleled opportunity to apply knowledge, business intuition, and analytical rigor to real-world challenges, building invaluable skills and experience along the way. It's a great way to set yourself up for future success—at Xelay Acumen and beyond. Candidates with all experience levels and backgrounds are encouraged to apply.

The Taipei Data Science Analyst role is a full-time position to support strategic evaluations, analyses, and communications of clinical, medical, and market data within the biotechnology, pharmaceutical, and healthcare provider industry, and collaborate with global Xelay team members to accomplish project engagement goals and objectives.  

Data Science Analysts at Xelay Acumen tackle the most advanced and difficult problems our clients face that drive bottom-line financial returns and create tremendous value, including
• Creating compelling communications of critical information
• Designing and developing visualizations of data and concepts to vastly improve audience engagement and understanding
• Conducting clinical trial data analytics and design
• Developing and writing medical publications and communications with novel analyses and compelling visualizations
• Researching to understand and shape new markets
• Framing new business and medical treatment models
• Assessing specific competitors' performance
• Performing due diligence

[Development]
1 of the 5 core values at Xelay is to “develop our people”. This value goes beyond being a mere statement—it is a dedicated promise to invest in the personal and professional evolution of every individual within our organization. At Xelay, we have cultivated an environment where learning is seamlessly integrated into our daily operations. We actively engage our team members in real client engagements, providing them with hands-on responsibilities that not only challenge and stretch their abilities but also accelerate their professional growth. This approach fosters a sense of ownership and accomplishment among our team members.

Our commitment to developing people extends to comprehensive training in consulting, leadership, and communication. This training is complemented by several offsite sessions throughout the year and biweekly meetings with mentors. We understand that each individual's journey is unique, and therefore, we offer personalized development plans tailored to the aspirations and goals of our team members. By championing a “people developing culture”, we empower our team members to excel in their current roles and prepare them for future leadership positions. We firmly believe that our investment in their growth is an investment in the overall success of our company.

[Responsibilities]
Data Science Analysts at Xelay Acumen quickly acquire the core capabilities of a successful, trustworthy team member through the following responsibilities:
• Manage individual workstreams
• Structure and solve challenging problems to address critical business issues
• Create compelling storylines and visualizations to accomplish critical communication challenges 
• Perform complex clinical trial and web survey data analyses in support of ad-hoc and ongoing projects
•Synthesize medical literature and communications into key takeaways and implications for clients
• Develop programs, methodologies, and files for analyzing and presenting data

info-job__text: 工研院產科國際所_歐洲領域產業(0T000)
info-company__text: 工研院 _財團法人工業技術研究院
info-company-addon-type: 其他專業／科學及技術業
info-description:
是否想過，轉個角度看世界，換個場域做研究，人生旅程會是怎樣不同的風景？ “Change is only another word for growth, another synonym for learning.” ~ Charles Handy, philosopher, UK 你充滿熱情、喜歡探索新事物、重視邏輯嗎？是否嚮往研究與實務的對話？ 歐洲產業研究組是一個共創成長的國際產業研究團隊，正在招募新血，期待你帶著專業與態度而來，與我們共同深究與擘劃既熟悉又陌生的歐洲：從厚實的基礎科學、頂尖的先進技術、豐沛的創新能量、到Net Zero議題的高瞻遠矚，歐洲以人為本的思維與作為，27個歐盟成員國的單一市場策略，在在需要我們跳脫慣性思維，不一樣的產業研究，不一樣的國際合作策略規劃。 “A good team is a great place to be, exciting, stimulating, supportive, successful.” ~ Charles Handy, philosopher, UK

工作內容：
1. 市場趨勢分析：蒐集並研析歐洲產業動態，追蹤新興技術與市場趨勢，為我國產業發展提供策略建言。
2. 跨國合作與交流：促進台灣與歐洲國家在技術及貿易上的合作，研擬雙方科技研發合作議題，強化雙邊產業連結。
3. 產業報告編撰：編寫深度產業研究報告，包含景氣預測、競爭力分析、投資機會評估等，支撐政府制定相關政策。
4. 客製化諮詢服務：跨領域合作與跨國研究規劃與執行，為國際合作布局提供規劃與諮詢服務。
5. 熟稔產業研究與資料分析方法，靈活運用於各領域研究分析。
若你具有產業研究經驗及流暢的外語能力，歡迎申請此職缺。

#關於我們
工研院產業科技國際策略發展所(簡稱:產科國際所)，是政府與產業均仰賴的智庫，結合產業研究與國際業務推動能量，以協助台灣產業布局全球市場為己任，以『促進台灣產業科技創新與價值提升』為願景。
旗下經營的IEK產業情報網已超過15年歷史，是國內產業情報資料庫的領導品牌。

info-description:
職務說明:  

1.資料標註：依照指引要求，用繁體中文（台灣）對資料執行精確的標註和分類。任務可能涉及識別文本中的特定主題、情感或分類。

*能夠遵循指示並準確、有效率地完成有時限的任務。
*能夠執行重複任務而不會降低品質。
*注重細節和解決問題的思維。

info-job__text: Data Architect 資料架構師   #ACT台灣敏捷大賞獎2024   #Data & AI. #分散式系統
info-company__text: 炬識科技股份有限公司
info-description:
炬識科技（Athemaster）2024.05 宣布，推出全新資料品質產品「Athemaster DQSentry」，幫助企業掌控真實資料品質，將企業資料產製成具更高商業價值的企業專屬大型語言模型等資料產品，加速AI數位轉型進程。
 
▎你想知道的 Athemaster：
● 請前往：https://linktr.ee/athemaster

▎Why Join Us
● 2種開發模式：瀑布 & 敏捷 雙刀流 [ 獲台灣敏捷協會 2024 敏捷大賞獎 ]
● 5種職系任你混搭搭配：每年依照個人意願打造專屬的成長路徑與職涯，不是工作量增加，而是組合技增加。
● 25堂阿基米德創客間：雙週五的固定學習講座課程，來自內部6個社群與聘請外部講師共學。
● 98% 以上機率可以 Work & Life Balance：此為所有專案成員的共同目標，並且認真執行。
● 200個以上的學習資源：包含線上課、電子書、實體書及多樣化的學習方式。


▎應徵條件
• Minimum 5+ years of experience with 3+ years into Data Architectural principles
• Perform architecture design, data modeling, and implementation of Big Data platform and analytic applications.
• Experiences in data governance design
• Experiences in data lifecycle management
• Analyze the latest Big Data Analytic technologies and their creative applications in business intelligence analysis.
• Good appreciation and at least one implementation experience in Big Data i.e. Spark, Storm etc
• Exposure to varying databases NoSQL, Cloud Storage Object, Relational Database (Oracle). Be able to cite implementation experiences constraints and performance challenges in practice
• Good knowledge with infrastructure, network, hardware and software
• Experiences in Finance Service industry is a plus

info-job__text: Software Engineer, Backend 後端工程師【聯想感-產品專案部】
info-company__text: 股感資訊股份有限公司
info-description:
【工作內容】
產品專案部負責依據實際客戶需求設計合理且可行的系統，此職缺工作內容主要包含：
1. 依照開發說明實際開發程式完成系統功能
2. 依照設計稿完成介面開發與資料呈現
3. 與前端工程師協作完成後端 API 開發

【我們希望你】
對技術的實作與精進抱有熱忱，認真看待被分派的任務與工項，不排斥學習及研究最新的技術堆疊，並且以獨立工作，共同開發可靠的系統為目標。

【職務需求】
-熟悉 Python 與 Django，並願意學習新程式語言及網站框架
-精通 API 、MVC/MVT、前後端分離等相關概念
-熟悉 PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB 任一一種資料庫
-熟悉基礎網路架構、能理解負載平衡、DB 讀寫分離等概念
-熟悉 Git (Git Flow) 版本控制 (我們使用 github)
-熟悉 Mac 開發環境

【福利與文化 (What We Offer)】
-參與最前沿的 CDP 技術專案，接觸國內外指標企業的實際業務需求。
-與一個富有熱情的跨職種團隊合作，共同打造客製化解決方案。
-提供技術進修補助，支援參加技術培訓或證照考試。
-滿滿零食吃到飽，滿足你的胃。
-不定期部門聚餐，與夥伴建立良好互動。

【面試流程】
1. [線上] 一面（60 分鐘）
    ➀ 線上題目，用 HackMD 進行，內容包含程式 Python Django、資料庫、Git、網路 - 30 分鐘
    ➁ 題目檢討 - 15 分鐘
    ➂ 公司介紹，包含商業模式、團隊組成、工作內容 - 10 分鐘
    ➃ 公司相關問題 Q & A - 5 分鐘
2. [實體] 二面（90 分鐘）
    ➀ 程式白紙題（大約介於 LeetCode easy ~ medium 之間） - 30 分鐘
    ➁ 系統架構題（以網路三層式架構為主，包含前端、後端、資料庫） - 30 分鐘
    ➂ 履歷討論，會根據履歷上以及一面沒討論到的部分做深入討論 - 10 分鐘
    ➃ 公司相關問題 Q & A - 20 分鐘

info-company__text: 香港商信天翁諮詢有限公司台灣分公司
info-description:
Description
We are growing! We are currently looking to hire a Questionnaire Specialist to work with us remotely!

Who we are:

Founded in 2006, our story started with two entrepreneurs. Today, we’re proud to be a global business. From Shanghai to Paris, we have 12 offices and operate across four continents in 70 countries. We are home to over 160 professionals from around the world, working together to serve more than 200 luxury clients.

At CXG, we love to evolve, elevate, and transform experiences while bringing brand promises to life. We offer strategic solutions that impact performance and elevate the customer experience of some of the world’s most iconic premium and luxury brands.

What you will be doing:

In this role, you will be responsible for the successful implementation of questionnaires under the supervision of the VP – Data Science.

Collaborative work environment: Join a dynamic team and work closely with project managers to prepare and set up questionnaires on our systems. Your input will be valuable in ensuring a smooth and efficient project launch.
Problem-solving opportunities: Use your skills in debugging logical conflicts and system errors to overcome challenges and ensure the flawless functioning of our projects. Your expertise will be crucial in maintaining high-quality standards.
Quality control and enhancement: As the gatekeeper of questionnaire quality, you will play a pivotal role in enhancing the overall analytical output. Your attention to detail and dedication to quality assurance will contribute to the success of our projects.
Global engagement: Manage daily requests from various departments around the world, providing support and assistance. This role offers the opportunity to collaborate with diverse teams and expand your cultural understanding.
Requirements
What you will bring along:

Detail-oriented and fast learner: We value individuals who pay close attention to detail, have a quick grasp of new concepts, and can effectively manage their time in a fast-paced work environment. A can-do attitude is essential to thriving in this role.
Strong logical mind and problem-solving skills: We are looking for candidates with a sharp and analytical mindset. Your ability to approach challenges logically and find effective solutions will be highly valued.
Strong communication skills: Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, are essential for this position. The ability to convey information clearly and effectively is crucial in collaborating with team members and stakeholders.
Exceptional written and oral communication abilities in English: Fluency in English, both written and spoken, is vital. Your proficiency in English will enable effective communication with international colleagues and stakeholders.
Experience with ERP or quality control (a plus): Previous experience with Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) systems or quality control processes would be advantageous. Familiarity with these areas will enhance your ability to contribute effectively to our operations.
Passion for the Luxury and Fashion industry: A genuine enthusiasm for the Luxury and Fashion industry is highly desirable. Your passion for this field will bring added motivation and dedication to your work.
Fluency in Chinese is a big plus!
If you have what we are looking for, please make sure to attach your updated Resume with your contact details.

Should your profile fit the requirements for the role, we will get in touch with you to get a deeper understanding of your profile, to discuss the role in more detail and potential next steps.

info-description:
***【Kindly submit your application directly through our company website. 請直接透過我們的公司網站提交您的申請】***
https://www.shl-medical.com/careers/jobs-at-shl-medical/it-sap-analyticsplanning-expert

SHL Medical is the world-leading solution provider in the design, development, and manufacturing of advanced drug delivery systems with more than 5000 employees worldwide. Our customers include top pharmaceutical and biotech companies from around the globe that require innovative devices such as auto injectors or pen injectors to effectively deliver their drugs. Headquartered in Switzerland since late 2018, with sites in Sweden, Taiwan, and the Unites States.

【Job Overview】
In this role, you will design and implement SAP Analytics and Planning solutions. You shall proactively develop the company’s business intelligence solutions for better performance and standardization.

【Responsibilities】
 Requirement analysis, design and implement the reporting and planning solutions for global enterprise data strategy and architecture
 Design and development of innovative SAP planning solutions based on SAP Analytics Cloud (SAC) for our internal customers.
 Design and development of SAP Analytics solutions with SAP BW/4HANA, SAP Analytics Cloud and SAP Datasphere technologies.
 Modelling of planning and analytics applications and where appropriate also take on coding and scripting tasks.
 Work with core team for reporting implementations and routine maintenance
 Analyze the existing Reports on all legacy systems and databases and define future fulfilment of BI needs in line with the target architecture


【Qulification】
 BS or MS degree in computer science, management information system, statistics, or related fields (or equivalent experience).
 Extended Experience in SAP Analytics for SAP BW/4HANA, S4/HANA, SAP Analytics Cloud. Good working knowledge on other reporting and data analytics solutions.
 Proven Experience in the development of Planning applications in the SAP Analytics Cloud, specifically with planning and forecasting modules.
 5+ years of hands-on experience in SAP Analytics development. Strong knowledge in ETL and data modelling.
 Excellent interpersonal and facilitation skills, with a proven ability to work with diverse professionals from multiple disciplines across all levels of seniority.
 Experience working in multi-cultural team.
 Experiences with Microsoft SQL, Databricks and Microsoft Fabric is a plus.
 Fluent in English. Sound communication and presentation skills.
 Mandarin or German as a plus.

格斯科技(GUS Technology)是由一群充滿活力與熱情的團隊組成，在這裡積極成長拒絕停滯。我們相信環保、綠能會逐日受到重視，伴隨電動車與儲能系統發展，各國將電池、鋰礦視為戰略物資，在此趨勢下電池產業勢必會是未來重要的明星產業。

格斯科技致力於生產電池芯與電池模組，所生產的軟包鋰電池具備高安全性、高蓄電力與高倍率放電、寬溫域的工作溫度區間及長循環壽命等特性，搭配能夠客製化的優勢，目前已拿下日歐等國家客戶之訂單，同時股票興櫃 : 格斯科技*(6940)。

更多資訊請看Linked in : https://tw.linkedin.com/company/gustechnology

免費供餐 | 全新廠區環境舒適 | 考核調薪

info-company__text: 倫敦證交所集團LSEG(FTSE International Taiwan Limited) _台灣富時國際股份有限公司
info-description:
Role Purpose
At LSEG, we are seeking a talented individual to join our Analytics Client Services (ACS) team. As an Associate Specialist in ACS, you will be responsible for delivering exceptional service to our clients across all LSEG Analytics products, including the Yield Book. The ideal candidate will demonstrate strong problem-solving and analytical skills, particularly in financial market, with a focus on fixed income markets.

As a trusted and authoritative source of fixed income analytics for more than 30 years, Yield Book offers an expanded set of capabilities that include market-leading data and cashflows modelling for in-depth security and portfolio analysis ranging from vanilla bonds to highly structured mortgages and complex derivatives for clients to comprehensively address their requirements. For more information, please visit www.yieldbook.com.

Responsibilities

This position provides an excellent opportunity to gain a broad perspective on various fixed income products. Key responsibilities include:

Acting as a first point of contact for institutional clients and taking ownership for the resolution of analytics inquiries

Learning about various fixed income products, including IRS, structure notes, CMO and other financial products

Gaining expertise in LSEG analytics products, including the Yield Book.

Assisting developers in testing new products

Building and maintaining strong relationships with internal and external stakeholders, ensuring clients receive the best possible service

Requirements

Bachelor’s Degree or equivalent in a financial or quantitative field

Knowledge of fixed income products

Exceptional problem-solving and analysis skills

Outstanding written and verbal communication skills in Mandarin and English

Strong team player and able to and prioritize tasks and maintain a professional approach under pressure

Proficient with Microsoft Office (Excel, Word and PowerPoint)

VBA or any programming skills for data processing is a plus

info-job__text: ERP+資料中台+ABI平臺的整合導入顧問經理  -歡迎居住宜蘭本地的人才
info-company__text: 德昂資訊股份有限公司
info-description:
職位名稱：ERP+資料中台+ABI平臺的整合導入顧問經理

工作地點：高雄或者台北 

職位描述：
我們正在尋找一位具備豐富經驗的ERP+資料中台+ABI平臺的整合導入顧問經理，主要負責零售、餐飲、運動健身連鎖及品牌銷售製造型企業的ERP、資料中台與ABI平臺的整合規劃與導入專案。此職位將專注於整體規劃、需求分析和全流程的專案管理，並介入測試、上線與運維的全流程Account管理，但不負責具體的實施工作。未來您有機會成為公司合夥人，並在行業的智慧分析平臺（資料中台+ABI平臺）的開發與推廣方面發揮關鍵作用。
主要職責：
1.	專案規劃與管理： 針對ERP、資料中台與ABI平臺進行整體規劃，負責專案的全流程管理，包括需求分析、方案設計、測試、上線及後續運維的Account管理。
2.	需求分析與方案設計： 深入瞭解客戶的業務流程和需求，針對ERP、資料中台與ABI平臺整合提出最佳解決方案，確保方案的可行性和有效性。
3.	測試與上線管理： 監督並介入系統的測試與上線階段，確保系統穩定上線並滿足業務運營需求。
4.	運維支援與改進： 在運維階段持續介入，管理和協助客戶的系統運行，提供優化建議以提升系統效能和業務效益。
5.	業務發展： 作為公司合夥人候選人，參與公司策略規劃，推動ERP、資料中台與ABI平臺整合導入服務和業務發展。
6.	智慧分析平臺的開發 ：在行業的智慧分析平臺（資料中台+ABI平臺）的開發中發揮作用，並持續推廣這些平臺的應用，以推動業務增長與創新。


任職要求：
1.	學歷要求： 資訊工程、資訊管理、商業管理等相關科系本科以上學歷。
2.	經驗要求： 至少8-10年ERP系統導入經驗，尤其是在零售、餐飲、運動健身連鎖及品牌銷售製造型企業有實際專案經驗。
3.	技術技能：
o	具備SAP、Oracle、Epicor、Infor、鼎新等大型ERP系統的導入經驗，熟練掌握ERP系統與資料中台、ABI平臺的整合方案設計與專案管理，具備強大的系統整合與需求分析能力。
o	如有MSTR，Tableau，PowerBI或任何BI工具的導入經驗，熟練掌握SQL語句，對Vertica，Hadoop平臺，ETL工具有足夠理解者優先討論。
o	瞭解資訊安全，能夠有效應對相關挑戰。
o	具備與甲方IT和業務單位溝通的能力，確保專案順利推進。
4.	專案管理能力：
o	具備卓越的專案管理能力，能夠在複雜環境中多工並行，按時交付高品質成果。
o	對專案損益管理有概念，能夠有效控制專案預算與資源分配。
5.	客戶服務意識： 以客戶為中心，能夠洞察客戶需求並提供切實可行的整合解決方案。
6.	學習意願： 對資料中台及ABI應用開發有濃厚興趣，並願意透過公司提供的資源和平臺進行學習與進修。
7.	領導能力：
o	具備良好的團隊合作與領導能力，能夠帶領團隊完成既定目標。
o	有管理專案團隊經驗和興趣者優先考慮。
8.	溝通能力： 優秀的溝通與表達能力，能夠清楚地傳達技術資訊和業務價值。

我們提供：
•	具競爭力的薪資與獎金
•	彈性的工作時間與遠端工作機會
•	學習與成長的機會，特別是在資料中台和ABI應用開發領域
•	未來成為公司合夥人的發展路徑
•	充滿活力與創新的工作環境

領導力要求
1. 個人素質
1.1 自驅力 Self-driven
1.2 自控力 Self-discipline
1.3 抗壓與韌性 Anti-pressure and Resilience
1.4 適應力 Adapting and Responding
1.5 自信果敢 Self-Efficacy and Courageous
1.6 自知力 Self Awareness
1.7 誠信正直 Integrity
2.	審慎
2.1 計畫組織 Planing and Organizing
2.2 服務客戶 Serving Customers
2.3 遵循指示 Following the Instructions and Procedures
3.	思維
3.1 用戶思維 User thinking
3.2 提煉總結 Refining and Conclusion
3.3 分析推理 Analytical Reasoning
3.4 學習敏銳 Learning Agility
3.5 開放創新 Openness and Innovation
3.6 策略思考 Strategic Thinking
4.	人際
4.1 團隊合作 Collaborating with Others
4.2 人際網路 Networking
4.3 說服影響 Persuading and Influencing
4.4 呈現與溝通 Presenting and Communicating
4.5 人際敏銳 Interpersonal Sensitivity
4.6 組織智慧 Organizational Acumen

5.	領導
5.1 建立信任 Building Trust
5.2 關懷包容 Caring and Inclusion
5.3 構建願景目標 Building Vision and Objectives
5.4 激發團隊 Motivating Team
5.5 發展他人 Coaching and Developing Others
5.6 推動執行 Supervising and Executing

6.	決策
6.1 商業洞察 Business Acumen
6.2 應對複雜多變 Leading Uncertainties
6.3 協調資源 Integrating Resources
6.4 決策力 Making Sound Decisions

info-job__text: 統一超商技術經理(客戶資料平台CDP)
info-company__text: 統一超商股份有限公司
info-description:
職位介紹：作為資料科學經理，您將帶領一支包含資料科學家與資料工程師的團隊，負責建置並維運大規模資料處理流程，並運用機器學習與人工智慧技術產出洞察，支援公司決策與產品優化。此職位需要針對龐大且多元的資料進行整合與分析，確保系統具備高可用性與擴充彈性，並與其他團隊（如工程、行銷、產品）密切合作，制定資料驅動的策略與專案。
職責：
● 訂定團隊目標與期望，培養以成長為導向的團隊文化，並適時提供回饋與指導。
● 策畫並推動資料科學技術與工具的路線圖，導入適當的機器學習平台與基礎建設。
● 監督並指導資料科學家與資料工程師的工作流程，確保在資料蒐集、處理、建模和部署各環節都符合最佳實務。
● 與各部門合作，理解業務需求並定義專案範疇，確保資料分析結果能夠真實落地並帶來效益。
● 建立並維護資料安全與合規機制，確保組織在使用資料時符合隱私與合規要求。

info-job__text: [全職] AI Deep Learning DSP 演算法工程師
info-company__text: 英霸聲學科技股份有限公司
info-company-addon-type: 消費性電子產品製造業
info-description:
Responsibilities
1. Design and develop noise reduction algorithms for hearing aids
	•	Utilize deep learning and machine learning techniques to develop core algorithms for noise suppression, speech enhancement, and speech separation tailored for hearing aids.
2.	Research and implement AI technologies
	•	Explore and implement state-of-the-art AI algorithms to enhance noise reduction and speech clarity performance in diverse hearing aid usage scenarios.
3.	Model training and optimization
	•	Handle data collection, labeling, training, and testing for noise reduction models, and perform performance optimization and fine-tuning.
4.	Real-time processing and deployment
	•	Efficiently deploy developed algorithms on embedded hearing aid platforms, ensuring high performance under low-power conditions.
5.	Data analysis and validation
	•	Analyze test results, perform model validation, and adjust algorithms to optimize performance for hearing aid applications.
6.	Cross-functional collaboration
	•	Collaborate closely with hardware, software, and product teams to integrate algorithms into hearing aid products and bring them to mass production.

Requirements and Skills
1.	Professional Experience
	•	Proven experience in audio signal processing and noise reduction algorithm development, with familiarity in hearing aid applications being a plus.
	•	Background in speech enhancement, speech separation, or adaptive filtering development.
2.	Mathematics and Algorithm Expertise
	•	Strong understanding of mathematics, probability, statistics, and machine learning principles, with the ability to optimize audio algorithms.
3.	Programming Skills
	•	Proficient in Python; experience with C/C++ development is a plus.
	•	Familiarity with deep learning frameworks (e.g., PyTorch, TensorFlow) and audio libraries (e.g., librosa, Kaldi).
4.	Data Processing and Analysis
	•	Experience in handling speech datasets, including data cleaning and labeling processes, as well as executing model tests and analyzing results.
5.	Soft Skills
	•	Excellent communication and collaboration skills, capable of working effectively with hardware, product, and user experience teams.
	•	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to tackle technical challenges efficiently.

Preferred Qualifications
•	Experience with Transformer-based models (e.g., Wav2Vec, Conformer) or Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) for speech processing.
•	Familiarity with hearing aid design and application requirements, or prior involvement in hearing aid development projects.
•	Expertise in algorithm optimization and model compression for low-power embedded devices.
•	Publications or patents in the field of audio signal processing or hearing aid technologies.


我們希望你是
1. 音樂家, 是音響發燒友, 科技產品狂熱者, 常常手滑購買國內外群募產品
2. 對數位音訊與深度學習有興趣, 喜歡動手寫音訊處理程式解決問題

info-company__text: 維曙智能科技有限公司
info-description:
維曙智能為創新AI應用開發商，具有全球市場商業化能力。公司有完整的創新孵化管線，包含從想法到技術與市場開發的完整配套流程，讓您將知識落實在各種實際場域中。如果您對以創新解決現實世界問題充滿熱忱，希望了解AI在產業的實務運作以及現實應用有興趣，這裡會是您大展身手的地方。歡迎加入我們。

作為資料科學家，需要對新技術保有高度熱誠，能夠歸納與統整大量的資料，並從中萃取出精華，發現未察覺的新知識。我們目前有多個利用生成式與因果AI平台衍生的產品線資料科學職缺, 包含:

1.機器視覺
透過3D/2D圖學轉換進行多模態資料前處理
以深度學習方法, 轉換多模態資料為結構化時間序列資料, 如分類, 辨識, 與異常偵測
透過因果模型做根因分析, 模擬響應曲線並進行源因變量的即時監控與優化

2.精準行銷: 
以時間序列因果推論方法與歸因分析, 評估全通路行銷組合效益以及預算配置優化
建構數位雙生模型, 利用生成AI方法做情境模擬與A/B測試

3.新藥開發
建立NLP/LLM技術管線, 解讀結構和非結構文本以及組學資料
辨識藥物、基因與疾病之間的關聯
分析臨床試驗中重要的預測性生物標記

4.因果推論
開發能處理高維變量的先進因果模型, 包含causal discovery, causality assessment
應用在上述各現實場域

【工作內容】
﹡客戶溝通與技術介紹，理解客戶需求以及該專業領域資訊
﹡收集與處理客戶與市場研究
﹡資料的探勘、分析與統計，並將其彙整成報告
﹡與AI工程師協作開發模型
﹡與前後端工程師合作建立產品與應用平台

維曙產品服務請參閱: www.vizuro.com
